Pea ko eni, kapau ‘e hoko atu ‘a Tīmote, pea mou tokanga ke ‘oua na‘a ai ha me‘a te ne fai manavasi‘i ai ‘ene feangai mo kimoutolu: he ko e ngāue ‘a e ‘Eiki ia ‘oku ne fai, ‘o tatau pē mo au.
Ko ia, ke ‘oua na‘a ai ha taha te ne ta‘etoka‘i ia; ka mou moimoi‘i lelei pē ke ne hoko mai kiate au: he ‘oku ou talitali kiate ia, ha‘ane ha‘u mo e kāinga.

Pea ko e me‘a ki si‘i tokoua ko ‘Āpolosi, ne u kole lahi kiate ia ke ‘alu atu kiate kimoutolu ‘i he ‘alu ‘a e kāinga: ka na‘e ‘ikai te ne momo‘i loto ke ‘alu ‘i he taimi ni; ka te ne ‘alu pē ‘oka ai ha faingamālie.
Mou ‘ā ‘o le‘o; mou tu‘u ‘aki ‘a e tui; mou fai ‘o ngali tangata; mou fakama‘u hifo.
‘Ilonga ha‘amou me‘a ‘e fai, fai pē ‘i he ‘ofa.
Pea ko si‘eku enginaki atu, kāinga. ‘Oku mou ‘ilo ‘a e fāmili ‘o Setivena, ko e fua tapu ia ‘o ‘Akeia, pea na‘a nau tuku kinautolu ‘e kinautolu ke fai ‘a e tauhi ‘o e kakai lotu.
Ko ia, ‘oku ou enginaki atu, ke mou tuku foki ‘a kimoutolu ki he me‘a ko ia, mo fakaongo ki he fa‘ahinga ko ia; ‘io, pea kiate ia kotoa pē ‘oku kaungā ngāue mo ia mo fakafitefita‘a.
Pea ‘oku ou fakafeta‘i ‘i he ha‘u ‘a Setivena mo Fotunato mo ‘Akeiko: he ko ‘enau ‘i heni kuo lelu ai ‘eku mamahi ‘i he ‘ikai te tau fe‘ilongaki:
he kuo nau fakafiemālie hoku loto mo ho‘omoutolu foki. Ko ia ke mou ‘ilo ‘a e fa‘ahinga pehē.
‘Oku ‘ofa atu ‘a e ngaahi siasi ‘Ēsia. ‘Oku ‘ofa lahi kiate kimoutolu ‘i he ‘Eiki ‘e ‘Akuila mo Pīsila, mo e siasi ‘oku ‘i hona ‘api.
‘Oku ‘ofa atu ‘a e kāinga lotu kotoa pē. Mou fefekita‘aki ‘aki ha ‘uma tapu.
Ko e fetapa ‘eni ‘oku fai‘aki ‘a e nima ‘o‘oku, Paula.
Ka ai ha taha ‘oku ‘ikai te ne ‘ofa ki he ‘Eiki, ke ne hoko koe mala‘ia! MALANATA!
Ko e kelesi ‘a e ‘Eiki ko Sīsū, ‘ofa ke ‘iate kimoutolu ia!
Si‘oku ‘ofa atu kiate kimoutolu kotoa pē ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū. ‘Ēmeni.

TŪ ko kimaua–‘a Paula ko e ‘Aposetolo ‘a Sīsū Kalaisi ‘i he tu‘utu‘uni ‘a e ‘Otua, mo si‘i kāinga ko Tīmote –ko ‘ema tohi ki he siasi ‘a e ‘Otua ‘oku ‘i Kolinitō, mo e kau lotu kotoa pē ‘oku ‘i ‘Akeia kātoa.
‘Ofa ke mou ma‘u kelesi mo e fiemālie, mei he ‘Otua, ko ‘etau Tamai mo e ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi.
Ha taha ā ke fakamālō‘ia pe ko e ‘Otua mo Tamai ‘a hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi! ‘a ia ko e Tamai ‘a e fai manava‘ofa, mo e ‘Otua ‘oku ‘a‘ana ‘a e tokoni kotoa pē;
‘a ia ‘oku ne tokoni kimautolu ‘i he‘emau tu‘utāmaki kotoa pē, koe‘uhi ke mau lava ai ke tokoni‘i ‘a kinautolu ‘oku ‘i he tu‘utāmaki kehekehe, ‘aki ‘a e tokoni ‘oku tokoni ‘aki kimautolu ‘e he ‘Otua.
He hangē ‘oku mahua mai ‘a e ngaahi mamahi ‘a Kalaisi kiate kimautolu; pehē ko e me‘a ‘ia Kalaisi ‘oku mahua mo homau tokoni‘i.

Ka neongo ko ha tu‘utāmaki ‘oku tō mai, ka ko e fai pē koe‘uhi ko homou tokoni‘i, mo homou fakamo‘ui; pea ka ko ha tokoni ‘oku tō mai, ko e fai ai pē koe‘uhi ko homou tokoni‘i–‘a ē ko ‘ene ngāue ‘a ho‘omou ‘ūkuma ‘a e ngaahi mamahi ‘oku mou mo‘ua tatau ai mo kimautolu.
Pea ‘oku ‘ikai tālakitu‘a ‘emau ‘amanaki ‘iate kimoutolu; ko ‘emau ‘ilo, hangē ‘oku tau kaungā mamahi, pehē foki ‘oku tau kaungā tokoni‘i.

He ‘oku ‘ikai te mau loto ke mou ta‘e‘ilo, kāinga, ki he tu‘utāmaki na‘e hoko kiate kimautolu ‘i ‘Ēsia; he‘emau mātu‘aki mafasia ai, ‘o ‘ikai mei lava ke tali, ko ia na‘e mole ‘aupito ‘emau ‘amanaki ki he mo‘ui.
‘Io, na‘a mau ongona kuo tonu ‘a kimautolu ki he mate: koe‘uhi ke ‘oua na‘a mau falala kiate kimautolu, ka ki he ‘Otua ‘a ia ‘oku ne fokotu‘u ‘a e pekia.
Pea ko ia ia na‘a ne hamusi kimautolu mei he fu‘u mate‘anga ko ia na‘e pehē fau, pea te ne hamusi: ‘io, ‘oku mau falala kiate ia te ne fai ai pē ‘ene hamusi.
Kehe ke mou kau ai foki, ‘o tu‘otu‘a ‘i he fai homau lotua: koe‘uhi ā ke hoko ‘i he hū ‘a e tokolahi ‘a homau ‘ofeina, kae fai ‘e ha tokolahi ‘a e fakafeta‘i koe‘uhi ko kimautolu.

He ko ‘emau pōlepole ‘a ‘eni, ko e fakapapau ‘e homau konisēnisi, ko ‘emau fakafeangai ki māmani, kae‘uma‘ā kiate kimoutolu, na‘e ‘i he mā‘oni‘oni faka‘otua, mo e loto hangataha, ‘o ‘ikai tu‘u ‘i he poto fakakakano, ka ‘i he kelesi ‘a e ‘Otua.
He tala‘ehai ‘oku mau tohi atu ha me‘a kehe, ka ko ena pē ‘oku mou lau, ‘io mo ongo‘i foki ko e mo‘oni; pea ‘oku te falala te mou ongo‘i kimautolu ‘o a‘u ki he ngata‘anga;
(‘o hangē foki ne fai ‘e homou ni‘ihi) ‘o pehē, ko homou pōlepole‘anga kimautolu, ‘o hangē ko homau pōlepole‘anga kimoutolu ‘i he ‘Aho ‘o hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū.
Pea ‘i he‘eku falala pehē, na‘a ku loto ke fuofua ‘alu kiate kimoutolu, koe‘uhi ke mou ma‘u tu‘o ua ha kelesi;
ka u fou atu ‘iate kimoutolu ki Masitōnia, ‘o u toe ha‘u mei Masitōnia kiate kimoutolu, kae ‘amoutolu hoku moimoi‘i ki Siutea.
Pea ‘i he‘eku loto pehē, na‘a ku va‘inga‘aki koā? pe ko ‘eku ngaahi tu‘utu‘uni ‘oku fokotu‘u fakaemāmani koā, koe‘uhi ke fai ‘a e ‘Io, ‘Io, mo e ‘Ikai ‘Ikai, ‘ō?
Ka ko e ‘Otua ‘oku mo‘oni! ‘oku ‘ikai ko e ‘Io pea ‘Ikai ‘a ‘emau ngaahi akonaki ‘oku fai atu.

He ko e ‘Alo ‘o e ‘Otua–‘a Kalaisi Sīsū, ‘a ia na‘e malanga‘aki ‘i homou ha‘oha‘onga ‘e kimautolu, ‘e au mo Silivenusi mo Tīmote,–tala‘ehai ne hoko ia ko e ‘Io pea ‘Ikai; kaekehe kuo ne hoko ko e ‘Io ‘iate ia.
He neongo pe ‘oku fiha ‘a e ngaahi tala‘ofa ‘a e ‘Otua, ka ‘oku tu‘u kotoa pē ‘iate ia hono ‘Io; ko ia ‘oku fou ‘iate ia foki hono ‘Ēmeni; ke ai ha ongoongolelei ‘e hoko ki he ‘Otua ‘iate kimautolu.
Pea ko eni, ko ia ‘oku ne vilitaki ai pē ‘a kimautolu mo kimoutolu ke tau taha mo ‘ene Pani, pea ne pani foki kitautolu, ko e ‘Otua ia:
‘a ia foki na‘a ne sila‘i kitautolu, pea ne ‘omi, ‘a e me‘a faka‘amanaki, ko e Laumālie ‘i hotau loto.
KA ko ‘eku lea ‘eni–ko e ‘Otua ē ke hopo mo hoku loto!–ko hono ‘uhinga ‘o e ‘ikai te u ‘alu atu ki Kolinito, ko ‘eku mamae pē kiate kimoutolu.
(Ka ‘oku ‘ikai ko ‘eku pehē ‘oku ‘amautolu ke pule ki ho‘omou tui: kaekehe ko e kau tokoni pē kimautolu ki he langa‘i ‘o ho‘omou fiefia. Seuke, ko e me‘a ki he tui ‘oku mou tu‘u.)

Pea koe‘uhi foki ko au na‘a ku tu‘utu‘uni ai ‘o pehē, ‘E ‘ikai te u toe ‘alu atu ke mamahi. He kapau ‘oku ou fakamamahi‘i kimoutolu, pea ko hai tū ha taha ke fakafiefia‘i au? ‘Ikai ko ia pē kuo mamahi meiate au?

Pea u tohi ‘a e me‘a ko ia, koe‘uhi ke ‘oua na‘a ku ‘alu atu ‘o kai mamahi meiate kinautolu, ‘a kinautolu na‘a ku mei fiefia ai: ko ‘eku falala ko e anga ‘eni ‘amoutolu fuli pē, ka ai ha‘aku fiefia, ko e fiefia ia ‘amoutolu kotoa.

He na‘e fai ‘eku tohi kiate kimoutolu mei hoku loto ne fu‘u mafasia mo feinga, pea fu‘u pani lo‘imata ‘eku ngaahi lea; pea na‘e ‘ikai fai ko homou fakamamahi‘i, ka koe‘uhi ke mou ‘ilo ‘eku ‘ofa, ‘ene hulu atu kiate kimoutolu.
Pea kapau kuo fai fakamamahi ‘e ha taha, ‘oku ‘ikai ko au kuo ne fakamamahi‘i ka ko kimoutolu kotoa–kehe ‘oku mou ongo‘i; he ‘oku ‘ikai te u fie ha‘aki ‘ai ke ne mafasia.

He kuo lahi pē ki ha toko taha pehē ‘a e tautea na‘e fai ‘e homou tokolahi. Ko ia na‘a mou mei angai mu‘a, ‘o fai hono fakamolemole mo hono fakafiemālie, na‘a ‘iloange ‘e fōngia ‘aupito ha toko taha pehē, ‘oka hulu atu ‘ene mamahi.
Ko ia, ‘oku ou enginaki atu ke mou fakapapau ho‘omou ‘ofa kiate ia.
He ko hono ‘uhinga ia foki na‘a ku fai ai ‘eku tohi, ke u ‘ilo ‘a e mo‘onia ‘omoutolu, pe te mou talangofua ‘i he me‘a kotoa pē.

Ka ko ia ‘oku mou fakamolemole ni ha me‘a ki ai, ‘oku ou fakamolemole mo au: kae‘uma‘ā ko e fakamolemole ‘a‘aku, ‘o kapau kuo u fakamolemole ha me‘a, kuo u fai ko e fakafofonga ‘o Kalaisi, pea koe‘uhi ko kimoutolu:
telia na‘a kākaa‘i kitautolu ‘e Sētane, he tala‘ehai ‘oku ‘ufikaua ‘iate kitautolu ‘a e ngaahi fāliunga ‘a e toko taha ko ia.
Pea ko eni, ‘i he‘eku hoko atu ki Taloasi ke malanga‘aki ‘a e Kōsipeli ‘o Kalaisi, pea neongo na‘e fakaava kiate au ha matapā ‘i he ngāue ‘a e ‘Eiki;
ka na‘e ‘ikai manofo ‘a hoku laumālie, ko e ‘ikai te u ‘ilo ai ‘a si‘oku tokoua ko Taitusi: ka na‘a ku fai ‘eku tatau kiate kinautolu, ‘o u ‘alu atu mei ai ki Masitōnia.
Pea ko eni, fakafeta‘i ki he ‘Otua, he‘ene sipikaki kimautolu ma‘u ai pē, ko e me‘a ‘ia Kalaisi, mo ne fakataufa atu ‘iate kimautolu ‘i he potu kotoa pē ‘a e nanamu ko e ‘ilo kiate ia.
He ko e ngangatu kimautolu ‘o Kalaisi ki he ‘Otua ‘iate kinautolu ‘oku fakatau ki he mo‘ui, mo kinautolu ‘oku fakatau ki mala:
ki he fa‘ahinga ko ē ko e nanamu ‘o ha mate, pea iku ki ha mate; ka ki he fa‘ahinga ko ē, ko e nanamu ‘o ha mo‘ui pea iku ki ha mo‘ui. Pea ko hai tū ‘oku fe‘unga mo ha fu‘u me‘a pehē?

He tala‘ehai ko ‘emau anga ke hangē ko e tokolahi ke hu‘i ‘a e folofola ‘a e ‘Otua: kaekehe, ko e anga ‘o ‘emau lea ‘ia Kalaisi, ko e lea ‘a ha taha ‘oku loto hanga taha, ko e lea ‘a ha taha ‘oku ha‘u tonu mei he ‘Otua, ko e mātu‘aki lea ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e ‘Otua.

TĀ ko ‘emau toe kamata ē ke sani kimautolu, ‘ō? tā na‘e mei totonu ‘apē ke mau fai ‘o hangē ko e ni‘ihi, ‘o ma‘u tohi fakaongo ‘i he‘emau ‘alu atu, pea ma‘u foki meiate kimoutolu ‘i he‘emau ō mai, ‘ō?
‘Ā, ko kimoutolu ko ‘emau tohi kuo tongi ‘i homau loto, ‘o lau mo toe lau ‘e he kakai kotoa pē:

‘o mou mātu‘aki e‘a ko e tohi na‘e fai ‘e Kalaisi, ‘o ‘ave ‘e kimautolu; ‘a ia ‘oku ‘ikai fai‘aki ‘a e vaitohi, kae ‘aki ‘a e Laumālie ‘o e ‘Otua Mo‘ui, ‘o ‘ikai tongi ‘i ha ngaahi tohi‘anga maka, ka ‘i ha ngaahi tohi‘anga mo‘ui, ko e ngaahi loto.
Pea ko eni, ko e me‘a ‘ia Kalaisi, ‘oku ‘i ai ha‘amau falala pehē ‘i he‘emau feangai mo e ‘Otua.
‘Oku ‘ikai ko ‘eku pehē, ‘oku mau fe‘unga ‘e kimautolu ke fakakaukau ha me‘a fakaekimautolu pē; ka ko homau fe‘unga‘anga ‘oku mei he ‘Otua;

‘a ia foki na‘a ne ngaohi kimautolu ke fe‘unga mo homau lakanga, ko e kau talafekau ‘o e Fuakava Fo‘ou, ‘o ‘ikai ‘o ha tohi, ka ‘o ha laumālie. He ‘oku nofo ‘a e tohi ke tāmate, ka ‘oku nofo ‘a e laumālie ke fakamo‘ui.

Pea ko eni, ko e tala mate na, ‘a ia na‘e tohi mata‘itohi mo tongi tongi ‘i ha ngaahi maka, ka na‘e pehē fau ‘a e lāngilangi ‘o ‘ene hoko mai, ko ia na‘e ‘ikai lava ‘e ha‘a ‘Isileli ke sio fakamama‘u ki he fofonga ‘o Mōsese, koe‘uhi ko e lāngilangi ‘o hono fōtunga, ‘a ia na‘e mole ngofua.
Pea kapau ko ia, huanoa ‘a e hoko lāngilangi mai ‘a e tala laumālie.
‘Io, kapau ko e me‘a lāngilangi ‘a e tala fakamo‘ua, kae huanoa ‘ene hulu atu ‘a e tala fakatonuhia ‘i he lau lāngilangi.
Pea neongo ko ha me‘a lāngilangi ‘ia, seuke, ‘oku ‘ikai hano lāngilangi ‘i he feitu‘u ko eni, koe‘uhi ko ‘ene fungani hake ‘a e lāngilangi ‘e taha.
‘Io, kapau na‘e fou lāngilangi mai ‘a e me‘a mole, huanoa ‘ene lāngilangi‘ia ‘a e me‘a tolonga.
Ko ia, ‘i he‘emau ma‘u ha ‘amanaki pehē, ‘oku mau ‘ai ke mahino ‘aupito ‘emau lea.
Pea ‘oku ‘ikai te mau fai ‘o hangē ko Mōsese, ‘a ia na‘a ne fa‘a ‘ai ha pulonga ki hono fofonga, koe‘uhi ke ‘oua na‘a sio atu ‘a ha‘a ‘Isileli, ‘o ma‘u ‘ene ngata ‘a e me‘a mole na.

Kaekehe, na‘e hoko ‘o kanongata‘a honau ‘atamai: seuke, ‘oku kei tu‘u pē ‘a e pulonga pē ko ia, ‘o a‘u mai ki he ‘aho ni, ‘oka fai ‘a e lau ‘o e Fuakava Motu‘a; ‘o ‘ikai tatala ‘a e pulonga ‘o ‘ilo kuo ka‘anga ia ‘ia Kalaisi.
‘Io, ka fai ha lau ‘o Mōsese ‘oku ma‘u pulonga honau loto, ‘o a‘u ki he ‘aho ni:
ka ‘oka tafoki ia ke hanga ki he ‘Eiki, pea to‘o ‘a e pulonga.
Ka ko e ‘Eiki ko eni ko e Laumālie: pea ‘ilonga ha potu ‘oku ‘i ai ‘a e Laumālie ‘o e ‘Eiki ‘oku ‘i ai ‘a e tau‘atāina.

Ka ko kitautolu kotoa pē, lolotonga ‘etau lau ta‘epūlou, ‘o sio ki he lāngilangi ‘o e ‘Eiki hangē ha ma‘ali mai ‘i ha sio‘ata, ‘oku tau liliu ai ki hono ‘īmisi ko ia, ‘o fai mei ha lāngilangi ki ha lāngilangi, ‘o hangē ai pē ko e ngāue ‘a e ‘Eiki ko Laumālie.
PEA ko e me‘a ‘i he‘emau ma‘u ‘a e lakanga ko ē (‘a ia ko e ‘ofa tu‘unga‘a pē na‘e fai); ko ia, ‘oku ‘ikai te mau fo‘i.

Ka mau li‘aki ‘a e fai fufū ‘o e ngaahi me‘a fakamā, ‘o ‘ikai te mau laka fakaoloolo, ‘uma‘ā ha‘amau hu‘i ‘a e folofola ‘a e ‘Otua: ka ko ‘emau ‘ai ke e‘a ‘a e mo‘oni, ko e me‘a ia ‘oku mau fakaongo ‘aki kimautolu ki he konisēnisi kehekehe ‘o e kakai ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e ‘Otua.
Pea kapau ‘oku mo‘oni ‘oku pulonga ‘emau kōsipeli, ‘oku pulonga pē ‘i he kakai ‘oku fakatau ki mala–‘a kinautolu kuo mo‘oni ai ‘a e me‘a.
Kuo fakakui ‘e he ‘otua ‘o e tu‘u ko eni ‘a e ‘atamai ‘o e kau ta‘etui, koe‘uhi ke ‘oua na‘a hulu‘ia ‘e he ulo mei he Kōsipeli ‘o e lāngilangi ‘o Kalaisi, ‘a ia ko e ‘īmisi ‘o e ‘Otua.
(He tala‘ehai ‘oku mau malangaekina kimautolu; ka ‘oku mau malanga‘aki ‘a Kalaisi Sīsū ko e ‘Eiki, pea ko kimautolu ko ho‘omou kau tamaio‘eiki koe‘uhi ko Sīsū.)

He ko e ‘Otua ia na‘a ne folofola, ‘E ulo mai ha maama mei he po‘uli; pea ko ia ia kuo ne ulo ‘i homau loto, koe‘uhi ke ai ha ulo atu ‘o e ‘ilo ki he lāngilangi ‘o e ‘Otua, ‘i he fofonga ‘o Sīsū Kalaisi.
Ka ko e anga ‘o ‘emau ma‘u ‘a e koloa ko ia, ‘oku fa‘o hina kelekele, koe‘uhi ke ‘a e ‘Otua ai pē ‘a e makehe atu ‘o e mafai, ‘o ‘ikai ko e me‘a meiate kimautolu.
Ko homau anga ē, ko e fetekeekina kimautolu mei he potu kotoa pē, kae ‘ikai ‘efitu‘ua; ko e fakapalalaua tu‘u kae ‘ikai hē ‘aupito;
ko e tulia kae ‘ikai li‘ekina ki he fili; ko e te‘ia kae ‘ikai fakamate.
‘Oku mau ‘alu fano ai pē mo kimautolu ‘i he sino ni ‘a e tau‘aki ‘a Sīsū, koe‘uhi ke hā foki ‘i homau sino ‘a e mo‘ui ‘a Sīsū.
Seuke, neongo ko e mo‘ui kimautolu, ka ‘oku tukuange ai pē kimautolu ke mate, koe‘uhi ko Sīsū; koe‘uhi ke hā ‘a e mo‘ui foki ‘a Sīsū ‘i he kakano mate ni ‘omautolu.
Ko ia, ko e mate ia ‘oku ngāue ‘iate kimautolu, ka ko e mo‘ui ‘iate kimoutolu.
Ka ko e me‘a ‘i he‘emau ma‘u ha laumālie tui, tatau mo ia ‘oku lau ki ai ‘a e Tohitapu, Na‘a ku tui, ko ia na‘a ku lea; pehē ‘oku mau tui foki, ko ia foki ‘oku mau lea:
he‘emau ‘ilo, ko ia na‘a ne fokotu‘u ‘a Sīsū, te ne fokotu‘u kimautolu foki mo Sīsū, pea ‘atu kimautolu fakataha mo kimoutolu.
He ko e me‘a ko ia kotoa ‘oku ma‘amoutolu, koe‘uhi ke opeope ‘a e kelesi, ko e me‘a ‘i he tokolahi ‘oku ma‘u ia, pea fakautuutu ai ‘i he‘ene ngāue ‘a e fakafeta‘i, kae ongoongolelei ai ‘a e ‘Otua.
Ko ia ai, ‘oku ‘ikai te mau fo‘i, ka neongo ‘oku ‘au‘auha homau nge‘esi tangata ni, ka ‘oku fai ai pē ‘a e fakafo‘ou ‘o homau tangata ‘i loto, ‘o hokohoko ‘aho pē.
He ko homau mamahi ma‘ama‘a ni mo mole, ‘oku ne fakatupu ma‘amautolu ha lāngilangi mamafa mo ta‘engata, ko e me‘a fungani ‘i he fungani ange fau;

lolotonga ‘oku ‘ikai te mau tokanga‘i ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku hā ni, ka ko e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku ‘ikai hā: he ko e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku hā ‘oku fakataimi pē, ka ko e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku ‘ikai hā ‘oku faka‘ītāniti.

‘IO, neongo ‘e veteki homau nofo‘anga fakaemāmani, ‘a ia ko e tēniti pē, ka ‘oku mau ‘ilo kuo ‘i ai ‘i he langi hamau fale langa ‘e he ‘Otua, ko e nofo‘anga na‘e ‘ikai ngaohi nima, ko e me‘a ta‘engata.
Seuke, lolotonga ‘emau ‘i he tēniti ni ‘oku mau māpuhoi, he‘emau holi ke ‘ai mei tu‘a homau fale tonu mei he langi:
he ka ‘iloa kitaua, kuo pau tokua kuo ta ‘ai ia, ‘o ‘ikai te ta telefua.

‘Io, ko kimautolu ‘oku ‘i he tēniti ni, ‘oku mau māpuhoi ‘i he‘emau mafasia; ko e me‘a ‘i he ‘ikai te mau loto ke to‘o ia, ka ke ‘omi ‘a e taha ‘o ‘ai mei tu‘a, koe‘uhi ke fōngia hifo ‘a e me‘a mate ni ‘i he mo‘ui.
Pea ko eni, ko ia na‘a ne fai homau teu ki he me‘a ko ia ko e ‘Otua, mo ne tuku mai hono me‘a faka‘amanaki ko e Laumālie.
Ko ia, ‘i he mālohi ai pē ‘emau ‘amanaki, kae‘uma‘ā ‘i he‘emau ‘ilo, ko e lolotonga ‘emau nofo ‘i homau ‘api ki tu‘a ni, ‘a e sino, ‘oku mau mama‘o mo homau ‘api ki ‘ao ki he ‘Eiki;
he ko ‘emau fononga ‘oku fai ‘aki ‘a e tui, ‘o ‘ikai ‘aki ‘a e mamata–ka ‘oku mālohi pē ‘emau ‘amanaki;
‘io, ‘oku lelei mu‘a kiate kimautolu ke mama‘o mo homau ‘api ki tu‘a ni, ‘a e sino, ka mau ‘i homau ‘api ki ‘ao, ‘o feangai mo e ‘Eiki.
Ko ia ai, foki ‘oku mau kakapa ki he me‘a ko eni, pe te mau ‘i he ‘api ko eni, pe te mau mama‘o, kehe pē ke ne hōifua ‘iate kimautolu.

He kuo pau ke tau mātu‘aki e‘a kotoa pē ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e fakamāu‘anga ‘o Kalaisi; koe‘uhi ke takitaha ma‘u hono totongi ‘o e ngaahi me‘a na‘a ne fai ‘i he sino, ‘o fakatatau ki he me‘a na‘a ne fai, ‘ene lelei pe kovi.
Ko ia, neongo ‘emau ongona ‘a e ‘apasia ki he ‘Eiki, ‘oku mau fakatui‘i ‘a e kakai kiate kimautolu; ka kuo loa ‘emau e‘a ki he ‘Otua; ‘io, ‘oku te falala kuo mau e‘a ki he konisēnisi ‘omoutolu foki.

‘Oku ‘ikai ko ‘emau toe sani atu kimautolu ‘eni, ka ko ‘emau ‘atu ha tu‘unga ki ho‘omou vikia kimautolu, koe‘uhi ke mou tali ‘aki kiate kinautolu ‘oku pōlepole ‘i he me‘a ‘oku hā ‘i tu‘a, kae ‘ikai ‘i he me‘a ‘o e loto.
He kapau ‘oku mau sesele, ka ko e fai ma‘a e ‘Otua: pea kapau ‘oku mau fakapotopoto, ka ko e fai ma‘amoutolu.
‘Io, ‘oku loki kimautolu ‘e he ‘ofa ‘a Kalaisi; he na‘e pehē ‘emau fakakaukau: na‘e mate ha toko taha ko e fetongi ‘o e kakai kotoa pē: pea tā na‘e mate ai kotoa pē:
pea ko ‘ene mate ‘o fetongi ‘a e kakai kotoa pē na‘e fai koe‘uhi ke ‘oua na‘a toe mo‘ui ma‘anautolu ‘a e kakai ‘oku mo‘ui, ka ma‘a e toko taha ko ia, ‘a ia na‘a ne pekia mo toetu‘u ko honau fetongi.
Ko ia, talu e me‘a ko ia mo e ‘ikai te mau ‘ilo ha taha ‘o fakaetangata pē; ‘io, neongo kuo mau lave‘i ‘a Kalaisi ‘o fakaetangata, ka ‘oku ‘ikai te mau kei lave‘i pehē.
Ko ia foki, kapau ‘oku ‘ia Kalaisi ha taha, ko e mātu‘aki fakatupu fo‘ou ia: kuo mole ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘o ono‘aho, uē kuo nau hoko ‘o fo‘ou.
Pea ko e ngaahi me‘a kotoa ko ia ‘oku tupu mei he ‘Otua, ‘a ia na‘a ne fai ‘ia Kalaisi ‘a e fakalelei ‘o hono finangalo mo kitautolu, mo ne ‘omi kiate kimautolu ‘a e tala ‘o e fakalelei ko ia:

‘o pehē tokua, na‘e fai ai pē ‘e he ‘Otua ‘ia Kalaisi ‘ene fakalelei ‘a māmani mo hono finangalo, ‘o ‘oua te ne lau kiate kinautolu ‘enau ngaahi angahala; pea ne hilifaki kiate kimautolu ‘a e lea ‘o e fakalelei.
Ko ia, ko e kau fakafofonga kimautolu ‘o Kalaisi; tokua ko e ‘Otua ia ‘oku enginaki ‘iate kimautolu: ko ‘emau kole ‘eni ‘oku fai ko e fetongi ‘o Kalaisi: tuku ke fai homou fakalelei mo e ‘Otua.
Na‘a ne ngaohi ko e koto angahala ‘a e Toko Taha ko ia na‘e ‘ikai te ne ongona ha angahala, koe‘uhi ā ko kitautolu; koe‘uhi ke tau hoko ai ‘iate ia ko e koto mā‘oni‘oni faka‘otua.
Kae‘uma‘ā ‘i he‘emau kaungā ngāue mo ia ‘oku mau enginaki foki ke ‘oua na‘a iku ho‘omou tali ‘a e kelesi ‘a e ‘Otua ko e laufanō.
He ‘oku ne folofola, Ko e taimi tali hū ne u ongo‘i ai ko ē, Ko e ‘aho fai fakamo‘ui ne u tokoni ai koe. Vakai mai, ko eni pē e taimi mātu‘aki tali hū; Vakai mai, ko eni pe ‘aho fai fakamo‘ui.
Kae‘uma‘ā ‘oku mau tokanga ke ‘oua na‘a ai ha tūkia‘anga ‘e tupu ‘i ha‘amau me‘a, na‘a lau‘i ‘a e lakanga.

Kaekehe ‘oku mau fai ‘a e me‘a ‘oku taau mo e kau sevāniti ‘a e ‘Otua ke fai, ‘oku mau ‘ai ke mau ongolelei ‘i he me‘a kotoa pē–‘i he fa‘a kātaki, ‘i he fa‘a fetekeekina, ‘i he fa‘a faingata‘a‘ia, ‘i he fa‘a ‘efitu‘ua;
‘i he fa‘a haha, ‘i he fa‘a nofo pilīsone, ‘i he fa‘a ‘ohofia; ‘i he fa‘a ngāue fakaongosia, ‘i he fa‘a ‘ā, ‘i he fa‘a ‘aukai;
he‘emau anga ma‘a, he‘emau poto ‘i he folofola, he‘emau anga mokomoko, he‘emau anga ‘ofa;
he‘emau Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni‘ia, he‘emau ‘ofa ta‘eloi, he‘emau tala ‘a e mo‘oni, he‘emau ma‘u ivi mei he ‘Otua;
ko ‘emau fai‘aki ‘a e mahafu ‘a e tonuhia ‘i to‘omata‘u mo to‘ohema, ko ‘emau ‘asi atu ‘i he toke‘ia mo e ta‘etoke‘ia, he lau‘ikovia mo e lau‘ileleia;
tokua ko e kau fai kākā mo e kau fai mo‘oni, tokua ko e kau ta‘e‘iloa mo e kau ‘iloa; tokua ‘oku mau tau‘aki, kae uē! ‘oku mau mo‘ui; tokua ko homau tautea ‘oku fai, ka ko eni,

‘oku ‘ikai te mau mate; tokua ko e kau toloto ‘i he mamahi, ka ‘oku mau fiefia ma‘u ai pē; tokua ko e kau masiva, ka ‘oku mau fakakoloa ha tokolahi; tokua ko e kau ta‘e-ma‘u-ha-me‘a; ‘osi, ‘oku mau mātu‘aki ma‘u ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē.
Si‘i kau Kolinitō, kuo fu‘u pu‘aki atu ‘e homau ngutu, kuo fano homau loto.
Ko ho‘omou ‘efi‘efi na ‘oku ‘ikai ‘iate kimautolu, ka ‘oku ‘i he manava ‘omoutolu pē.
‘Ē, ka u lea hangē ki ha fānau, mou tali ‘eku fai‘aki ha fai pehē, ‘o mou fano mo kimoutolu.
‘Oua te mou hanga ‘o hoa-‘a-kehe, he nonofo mo e kau ta‘elotu: he ‘e me‘a taha fēfē ‘a e faitotonu mo e malakilao? pe feohi fēfē ‘a e maama mo e po‘uli?
‘io, ‘o loto taha fēfē ‘a Kalaisi mo Peliali? Pe ‘inasi fakataha fēfē ‘a e lotu mo e ta‘elotu?

‘io, pea fa‘ahi fēfē ‘a e temipale ‘o e ‘Otua mo e ngaahi ‘aitoli? He ko kitautolu ko e temipale ‘o e ‘Otua Mo‘ui; ‘o hangē ko ‘ene folofola ‘a e ‘Otua, ‘o pehē, Te u fale ‘aki kinautolu, te u ‘eve‘eva ‘iate kinautolu, pea te u nofo ko honau ‘Otua, pea te nau nofo ko hoku kakai.
Ko ia, mou hiki mei honau lotolotonga, pea mavahe kimoutolu, pea ‘oua te mou ala ki he me‘a ta‘ema‘a; ko e folofola ē ‘a e ‘Eiki–
Pea te u ma‘u kimoutolu ‘e au, pea te u nofo atu ma‘amou tamai, pea te mou nofo mai mōku ngaahi foha mōku ngaahi ‘ōfefine–ko e folofola ē ‘a e ‘Eiki Fakaleveleva.
Ko ia, si‘oku ‘ofa‘anga, he‘etau ma‘u ha ngaahi palōmesi pehē fau, tau fakama‘a kitautolu mei he ‘uli kotoa pē ‘o e kakano mo e loto, ‘o tau fakakakato ‘etau mā‘oni‘oni ‘i he ‘apasia ki he ‘Otua.
Ē, tuku hamau feitu‘u ‘i homou loto: tala‘ehai na‘a mau ngāue ta‘etotonu ki ha taha, tala‘ehai na‘a mau maumau‘i ha taha, tala‘ehai na‘a mau fakahekeheke‘i ha taha.
‘Oku ‘ikai te u lea pehē ko e valoki: seuke, kuo ‘osi ‘eku fakahā ‘oku mou ‘i homau loto ke mate mo mo‘ui fakataha mo kimoutolu.
‘Oku lahi ‘ete falala kiate kimoutolu, ‘oku lahi ‘ete pōlepole ‘iate kimoutolu.
Kuo u fonu ngutungutu ‘i he fiemālie na‘e ‘omi; ‘oku hake fu‘u ‘a e fiefia, pea ngalo ai ‘emau ngaahi mamahi kehekehe.
He na‘a mo ‘emau ōmai ki Masitōnia ni, ka na‘e ‘ikai momo‘i manofo homau kakano, ka na‘e tautu‘u mai homau fakamamahi mei he potu kotoa pē: mei tu‘a ko e koto fepaki, mei loto ko e koto hoha‘a.
Ka ko e ‘Otua, ‘a ia ‘oku ne tokoni ai pē kiate kinautolu ‘oku mo‘ulaloa, na‘a ne tokoni‘i kimautolu ‘aki ‘a e lava mai ‘a Taitusi:

‘o ‘ikai ‘aki ‘ene lava mai pē, kae ‘aki ‘a e tokoni foki, ‘a ia ne tokoni ‘aki ia ‘e kimoutolu: he na‘e pehē ‘ene fakamatala kiate kimautolu ho‘omou holi mai, ho‘omou fakamamahi, ho‘omou mamahi‘i au; ko ia na‘e ‘āsili ai ‘eku fiefia.
He neongo na‘a ku fakamamahi‘i kimoutolu ‘aki ‘eku tohi, ‘oku ‘ikai te u tālakitu‘a ‘i he‘eku fai ia, ka ‘oku mo‘oni na‘a ku tālakitu‘a ai.

Neongo na‘e fuonounou, ka ‘oku ou vakai na‘e ‘i ai mo‘oni ho‘omou mamahi ‘i he tohi ko ia; ka ‘oku ou fiefia ‘eni, ‘o ‘ikai pē koe‘uhi ko ho‘omou mamahi, ka koe‘uhi na‘e iku ho‘omou mamahi ki ho‘omou fakatomala: he ko homou fakamamahi na‘e fai ‘i he funga ‘o e finangalo ‘o e ‘Otua, ke ‘oua na‘a ai hamou maumau‘i ‘e hoko ‘i he‘emau ngāue.
He ko e mamahi ‘oku faka‘otua hono fai, ‘oku ne langa‘i ha fakatomala ‘oku iku ki ha fakamo‘ui, ‘a ia ‘e ‘ikai tālakitu‘a ai ha taha: ka ko e mamahi ‘oku fakaemāmani ‘oku ne fakatupu mate.

He vakai ‘a e me‘a na, ‘a ho‘omou mamahi faka‘otua na‘e fai, hono nifi ‘a e feinga na‘e tupu ai ‘iate kimoutolu! kae‘uma‘ā ‘a e faka‘ata‘atā kimoutolu, ‘uma‘ā ‘a e faka‘ise‘isa‘ia, ‘uma‘ā ‘a e manavahē mai, ‘uma‘ā ‘a e holi mai, ‘uma‘ā ‘a e manavakāvakava, ‘uma‘ā ‘a e fai tautea! Kuo mou fai homou tūkuingata ke fakahā ‘oku mou ‘ata‘atā ‘i he me‘a.

‘Āua; he neongo na‘a ku tohi pehē atu, tala‘ehai na‘a ku fai koe‘uhi ko e siana na‘e fai ‘a e kovi, ‘uma‘ā ‘a e tangata na‘e fai ki ai ‘a e kovi; ka koe‘uhi ke e‘a kiate kimoutolu, pea ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e ‘Otua, ‘a e toka homou loto kiate kimautolu.

Ko hono ‘uhinga ia ‘e taha ‘o ‘emau fiemālie na‘e fai: ka na‘e fakalahi ki ai, ‘io, ko e me‘a na‘e fu‘u hulu atu ai ‘emau fiefia, ko e fiefia ‘a Taitusi, koe‘uhi kuo ma‘u nonga hono loto meiate kimoutolu kotoa pē.

He ka ai ha‘aku pōlepole ‘iate kimoutolu ne fai kiate ia, ne ‘ikai fakamaa‘i ai au; kaekehe hangē na‘e mo‘oni ‘emau ngaahi lea kehekehe na‘e fai kiate kimoutolu, pehē foki na‘e hā ‘oku mo‘oni mo ‘emau pōlepole na‘e fai ‘i he ‘ao ‘o Taitusi.
‘Io, ‘oku ‘āsili ngaue hono fatu kiate kimoutolu ‘i he‘ene fa‘a manatu hake ki he talangofua ‘amoutolu kotoa pē, ‘a ho‘omou tali ia ‘i he ‘apasia mo e tailiili.
‘Ā, ‘oku te fiefia; he ko e me‘a ‘i ho‘omou ngāue, ‘oku te to‘a ‘i he me‘a kotoa pē.
PEA ko eni, ‘oku mau ongoongo atu, kāinga, ‘a e kelesi kuo tuku mei he ‘Otua ki he ngaahi siasi ‘i Masitōnia;
‘o pehē, neongo na‘e ‘ahi‘ahi‘i kinautolu ‘aki ha fu‘u mamahi, ka na‘e opeope ‘enau fiefia: pea neongo e ‘ango‘ango ‘enau masiva, ka ka mahake mei ai ha fu‘u koloa foaki.
‘Io, ‘oku ou fakamo‘oni, kuo nau fai ki he ngātanga ‘o ‘enau mafai, ‘io, ‘o mahili atu;
pea ko e langa‘i ‘e kinautolu, he‘enau kole fakamātoato ke mau ofa ‘o tuku ke nau kau ‘i he tokoni‘i ‘o e fa‘ahinga tapu.
Kae‘uma‘ā e me‘a tēpū, ‘a ia na‘e ‘ikai te mau ‘amanekina, na‘a nau li‘aki kinautolu ki he ‘Eiki, pea kiate kimautolu foki, ‘i he hā ko e finangalo ia ‘o e ‘Otua.
Ko ia, na‘a mau kole kia Taitusi, ko e me‘a ‘i he ‘a‘ana ‘a e langa‘i ‘o e kelesi ni ‘iate kimoutolu, ko ia ke ne ‘alu atu foki ‘o fakahaohaoa ia.

Kehe pē, he hangē ‘oku mou hulu atu ‘i he me‘a kotoa pē–‘i he tui, mo e akonaki, mo e ‘ilo loloto, mo e feinga kehekehe, kae‘uma‘ā ‘i he ‘ofa kiate kimautolu –ke pehē foki ho‘omou hulu atu ‘i he kelesi ko eni.
‘Oku ‘ikai te u lea pehē ko e fekau; ka ko ‘eku fakahaa‘ia ‘a e feinga ‘a e kakai kehe, ke u sivi ai ‘a e mo‘oni ‘o e ‘ofa ‘amoutolu foki.
(Seuke, ‘oku mou ‘ilo ‘a e ‘ofa ‘a hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi he‘ene koloa‘ia, ka ne hoko ko e masiva koe‘uhi ko kimoutolu, koe‘uhi ko e me‘a ‘i he‘ene masiva ke mou hoko ko e koloa‘ia.)

‘Io, ‘i he me‘a ni ko ‘eku fakakaukau pē ‘oku ‘atu: he ko ia pē ‘oku taau mo ha ni‘ihi pehē; he na‘a mou kamata ‘i he ta‘u kuo hili, ‘o mu‘omu‘a ‘i he ngaahi siasi ko ē; ‘o ‘ikai ‘i hono kamata fai pē ‘o e me‘a, ka ‘i hono o‘i foki.
‘Ē, ke mou faka‘osi ‘eni hono fai foki: he ‘oku mo‘oni na‘a mou loto lelei leva ke o‘i, ka koe‘uhi ke ai hano faka‘osi ‘e hoa mo ia, pea taau mo ho‘omou mafai.
He kapau ko loto fiefai ‘oku ta‘utu mai, ko ‘ene hōifua ai ‘a e ‘Eiki ‘oku fakafuofua ‘aki ‘a e me‘a ‘oku ne ma‘u, ‘o ‘ikai ‘aki ‘a e me‘a ‘oku ‘ikai te ne ma‘u.
Pea tala‘ehai ko e fai ‘eni ke ma‘u fiemālie ai ha ni‘ihi, kae mafasia kimoutolu;

‘ikai, ka ko e fai‘aki ‘a e lao ‘o e fakafe‘unga: ‘o pehē, ‘i he taimi ko eni, ke lave atu ho‘omou me‘a hulu ki he‘enau me‘a ta‘ea‘u; kae toki lave mai foki ‘enau me‘a hulu ki ho‘omou me‘a ta‘ea‘u, koe‘uhi ke ai ha fakafe‘unga:
‘o hangē ko e folofola, Ko ia na‘a ne tufi ‘o lahi na‘e ‘ikai tomo atu, pea ko ia na‘e tufi ‘o si‘i, na‘e ‘ikai ta‘ekakato.
Pea fakafeta‘i ki he ‘Otua, he‘ene fakatupu ‘i he loto ‘o Taitusi ha tokanga kiate kimoutolu ‘oku hangē ko ha‘aku.
He ko ‘ene ‘alu atu na, ‘oku mo‘oni ko ‘ene tali ‘eku kole, ka na‘e kimui ia, ka kuo loa ‘ene tokanga ‘e ia ke fai.
Pea ko eni kuo mau fekau ke ō mo ia ‘a si‘i kāinga ko ia, ‘a ia ‘oku ne ongoongolelei ‘i he Ngāue ‘i he ngaahi siasi kotoa pē;

pea ‘ikai‘ia ko ia, ka na‘e fili ia foki ‘e he ngaahi siasi ‘i he hiki nima, ke kau mo kimautolu ‘i he ‘ave ‘o e ‘ofa ni, ‘a ia kuo tuku kiate kimautolu hono tauhi; telia ‘a e ongoongolelei ‘o e ‘Eiki, pea koe‘uhi ke mau fie tali ‘a e ngāue ko ia–
ko ‘emau faka‘ehi‘ehi pehē, na‘a lau‘i kimautolu ‘e ha taha ‘i he fu‘u koloa ni kuo tuku kiate kimautolu hono tauhi.
He ko ‘emau anga ke tomu‘a fakakaukau‘i ‘emau ngaahi me‘a ke hā lelei, ‘o ‘ikai ki he ‘Otua pē, ka ki he tangata foki.

Pea kuo mau fekau ke ō mo kinaua ‘a si‘omau kāinga ‘e taha; ko e toko taha kuo tu‘o lahi ‘emau sivi, pea ‘i he ngaahi me‘a lahi, ‘o mau ‘ilo ko e taha ‘oku feinga mo‘oni: pea ‘i he taimi ni ‘oku ‘āsili lahi ‘ene feinga ko ‘ene falala ‘aupito kiate kimoutolu.

Ko ia, kapau ko e ‘eke kia Taitusi, ko e kaume‘a ia ‘o‘oku, kae‘uma‘ā ko e kaungā ngaue ‘o‘oku ‘i he fai kiate kimoutolu. Pea kapau ko e ‘eke ki si‘i ongo kāinga ni, ko e ongo fakafofonga kinaua ‘o e ngaahi siasi, pea ko e lāngilangi ‘o Kalaisi.
Ko ia, ko ho‘omou tuku ke hā kiate kinautolu ‘a e mo‘oni ‘o ho‘omou ‘ofa, mo e mo‘oni ‘o ‘emau pōlepole ‘iate kimoutolu, ko ho‘omou mātu‘aki fai ia ki he ngaahi siasi.
HE ko e me‘a ki he tokoni ki he fa‘ahinga tapu, seuke koe‘uma‘ā ‘eku tohi atu ai:

he ‘oku ou ‘ilo ho‘omou loto fiefai; ‘io, ko ia ia ‘oku ou fa‘a pōlepole ai ‘iate kimoutolu ki he kau Masitōnia, he‘eku pehē, Talu e ta‘u kuo hili mo e ‘osi teu ‘a ‘Akeia: pea ko ho‘omou fai velenga ko ia na‘e o‘i ai ‘a e tokolahi.
Ka neongo ia, ka kuo u tuku atu ‘a e kāinga na, na‘a hala ‘i he fo‘i me‘a ko eni ‘emau pōlepole ‘iate kimoutolu ne fai; ka koe‘uhi ke kakato ho‘omou teu, ‘o hangē ko ia kuo u fa‘a lau ki ai:
na‘a ‘iloange ‘e ō atu mo au ha kau Masitōnia, ‘o nau ‘ilo kimoutolu kuo te‘eki ke ‘osi, pea mau mā ai kimautolu ‘i he tu‘anaki ko eni (tuku kehe pē ‘a e mā ‘amoutolu).

Ko ia, na‘a ku pehē, ko hono mei lelei ke u kole ki he kāinga na ke mu‘omu‘a atu kiate kimoutolu, ‘o sinaki fakamā‘opo‘opo ho‘omou me‘a‘ofa na, ‘a ia kuo loa hono fakahaa‘i; koe‘uhi ke napangapangamālie ia, ‘o ngali ko ha me‘a‘ofa, ‘o ‘ikai ko ha ‘atu mamae.
Kae manatu, Ko ia ‘oku fakakaisi‘i ‘ene fakaheka ‘e fakakaisi‘i foki ‘ene utu mai: pea ko ia ‘oku fakakailahi ‘ene fakaheka ‘e fakakailahi foki ‘ene utu mai.
Ke takitaha fai ki he me‘a kuo ne tu‘utu‘uni ‘i hono loto; pea ‘oua ‘e fai ‘i he mamahi, pe ko e pu‘ia; he ‘oku ‘ofa ‘a e ‘Otua ki ha taha ‘oku vēkeveke foaki.

Pea ‘oku mafai noa pē ‘e he ‘Otua ke ‘atu ke mou fonu mahuohua ‘i he fa‘ahinga foaki kotoa pē; koe‘uhi ke fe‘unga ho‘omou koloa kehekehe ‘i he taimi kotoa pē mo e me‘a kotoa pē, pea toe ha‘amou me‘a ke fai‘aki ‘a e ngāue lelei kehekehe.
Hangē ko e folofola, Na‘e laku tavale ‘e ia, Ne ne tufa ki he masiva, ‘E tolonga ‘ene fai lelei ‘o ta‘engata.
Pea ko ia ‘oku ne tokonaki ‘a e pulopula ki he tō mo e me‘a ki he kai, te ne tokonaki mo fakalahi ho‘omou pulopula, pea fakatupulekina ‘a e fua ‘o ho‘omou fai lelei:
kae alaisia alaikolonga homou fakakoloa‘ia, koe‘uhi ke alaisia alaikolonga ho‘omou foaki, ‘a ia ko e me‘a fakatupu fakafeta‘i ki he ‘Otua, ‘i he‘emau tufaki.
He ko e fai tokoni ni ma‘a hotau kakai, ‘oku ‘ikai ngata pē ‘ene ‘aonga ‘i he fakakakato ‘o e masiva ‘o e fa‘ahinga tapu; ka ‘oku ope atu foki ko e ngaahi fu‘u fakafeta‘i ki he ‘Otua;

ko e fakamālō‘ia ‘a e ‘Otua ‘e he kakai, koe‘uhi ko e ngaahi me‘a kuo hā mo‘oni ‘i he tokoni ni–‘a ho‘omou fai ki ho‘omou tukupā ki he Kōsipeli ‘o Kalaisi, pea mo e ‘aufuatō ‘o ho‘omou fie kau kiate kinautolu pea mo e kāinga kotoa pē;
kae‘uma‘ā ‘i he‘enau lotua kimoutolu, te nau faka‘amu ke mou fe‘iloaki koe‘uhi ko e opeope ‘iate kimoutolu ‘a e kelesi ‘a e ‘Otua.
‘Ē, fakafeta‘i mu‘a ki he ‘Otua, he‘ene me‘a‘ofa ko ia ‘oku ta‘emalaua.

PEA ko eni, ko au Paula ‘oku ou kole atu ‘aki ‘a e fa‘a kātaki mo e fakaalaala ‘a Kalaisi: ‘a kita ‘oku te hā ‘i tu‘a ko e feifei‘avale ‘i he‘ete ‘iate kimoutolu, ka ‘i he‘ete toki mama‘o tokua, pea ngali to‘a ‘ete fai atu;

‘io, ko au ia ‘oku ou hū atu, ke ‘oua na‘a ai ha‘aku ngali to‘a foki ‘i he‘eku ‘i ai, he‘eku tu‘unganaki hoku lakanga; ‘a ia ‘oku ou pehē ke ‘ahi‘ahi ai ha me‘a ki ha ni‘ihi, ‘a kinautolu ‘oku nau pehē ‘oku mau fou fakaekakano pē.
Seuke! Neongo ‘oku mau fou ‘i he kakano, tala‘ehai ‘oku fakaekakano ‘emau fai tau.
He ko e mahafu ‘o e tau ‘oku mau fai, ‘oku ‘ikai ko e koto kakano, ka ko e mahafu kuo olo‘i ‘e he ‘Otua mo‘o holoki ‘o e ngaahi kolotau.
‘O mau holoki ‘aki ‘a e ngaahi fakakaukau, mo e mā‘olunga kotoa pē ‘oku fokotu‘u ke ta‘ofi ‘a e ‘ilo ki he ‘Otua; pea mau taki pōpula ‘a e feinga kotoa pē ‘a e loto ke fakavaivai kia Kalaisi:
‘o mau tali teu ke toki tautea ‘a e talangata‘a kotoa pē, ‘oka kakato ho‘omou fakavaivai.

‘Oku mou tokanga pē koā ki he me‘a ‘oku hā ‘i tu‘a? Ka ai ha taha ‘oku ne falala ko e toko taha ia ‘o Kalaisi, ‘ē, ke ne toe fakakaukau‘i ‘a e me‘a ‘e ia, ‘o ‘ilo ‘a e me‘a ni: neongo pe ko e hā ‘ene kaunga ‘a‘ana kia Kalaisi, ka ‘oku mau tatau ai foki.
Seuke, tala‘ehai ‘e lava haku fakamaa‘i, ‘o kapau ‘e toe taha atu ‘eku pōlepole ‘i he pule kuo tuku ‘e he ‘Eiki kiate kimautolu: (‘a ia na‘e tuku mai mo‘omou langa hake, ‘o ‘ikai mo‘omou holoki):
ka telia na‘a hangē ko ha‘ate fie fakamana‘i kimoutolu ‘aki ‘ete ngaahi ‘ipiseli.
He ‘oku lau tokua, Ko ‘ene ngaahi ‘ipiseli ‘oku mamafa mo kaukaua; ka ko e fotu mai ‘o hono sino ‘oku masivesiva, pea ko ene lea ‘oku pasī pē.
‘Ē, ke fakakaukau mu‘a ‘e he toko taha lau pehē, ‘o ne ‘ilo ‘a e me‘a ni, ko ‘emau ngaahi ‘ulungālau ‘i he‘emau ngaahi ‘ipiseli ‘oka mama‘o, ko ‘emau ngaahi ‘ulungāngāue ai pē ia ‘oka mau ka ‘i ai.

He ‘oku ‘ikai te mau fa‘a pehē, kuo mau a‘usia ha ni‘ihi ‘i he fa‘ahinga na ‘oku sani kinautolu, pe te mau fa‘a fakatatau kimautolu ki ai: ka ‘oku ‘ikai te nau ngali poto, he‘enau fua kinautolu ‘aki kinautolu, mo ‘enau fakatatau kinautolu mo kinautolu.
Ka ko kimautolu ‘e ‘ikai te mau pōlepole ta‘eha kau‘ā; ka ko hono kau‘ā ko e ngafa na‘e vahe mai ‘e he ‘Otua, ‘a ia na‘e pehē ke mātu‘aki a‘u kiate kimoutolu.
He tala‘ehai ko ‘emau toloaki ‘eni homau kau‘ā, ‘o hangē ‘oku ‘ikai te mau a‘u atu; he na‘e mātu‘aki a‘u kiate kimautolu ‘enau ongoongo ‘a e Kōsipeli ‘o Kalaisi.

Pea neongo ‘oku ‘ikai kau ‘eni ‘emau pōlepole ki he tu‘a kau‘ā, ‘o fai ‘i he fua ‘o e ongosia ‘a e kakai kehe; ka ‘oku ma‘u ‘emau ‘amanaki, ka mou ka tupulekina ‘i he lotu, pea ‘e toki fakalahi meiate kimoutolu, (ka ‘i homau ngafa pē ‘omautolu)
‘o mau totolo atu ki he ngaahi feitu‘u ki kō atu, ke malanga‘aki ‘a e Kōsipeli; ‘o ‘ikai ‘i he ngafa ‘o ha taha kehe ke mau pōlepole ‘i he ngaahi me‘a ne ‘osi teu.
Ka ko ia ‘oku pōlepole, ke tu‘unga ‘ene pōlepole mei he ‘Eiki:
he tala‘ehai ko e mālō ia ‘a ia ‘oku ne sani ia ‘e ia, ka ko ia ‘oku sani ‘e he ‘Eiki.
TAUANGE mo kimoutolu ke mou kātaki si‘aku fai fakasesele! ka ko ‘eku lau ki ai: he ‘oku mou fa‘a kātaki ‘eku tō‘onga.
He ‘oku ou fua‘atekina kimoutolu, he‘eku fua‘a telia ‘a e ‘Otua: he na‘a ku moa‘uli‘i kimoutolu ke mali mo ha toko taha pē, ‘io, ke u ‘atu kimoutolu kia Kalaisi ko e ta‘ahine molumalu.
Pea ‘oku te manavahē tu‘u na‘a ‘iloange ‘e le‘ei ho‘omou tokanga, ‘o mou hiki mei ho‘omou toka taha mo nofo molumalu kia Kalaisi; ‘o hangē ne kākaa‘i ‘a ‘Ivi ‘e he Ngata ‘aki ‘ene olo.

‘Io, kapau ‘oku malanga‘aki ‘e he ha‘u fo‘ou na ha Sīsū ‘e taha, ‘a ia ‘oku ‘ikai ko e Sīsū na‘a mau malanga‘aki; pea kapau ‘oku mou ma‘u ai ha Laumālie ‘oku fa‘a hinga kehe mo ia na‘a mou ma‘u mu‘a, pe ha Kōsipeli ‘oku fai kehe mo ia na‘a mou tomu‘a tali; pea tā ‘oku tonuhia pē ho‘omou kātaki ‘ene tō‘onga.
He seuke, ‘oku te pehē ‘e kita ‘oku ‘ikai te te momo‘i tōmui ‘i he ha‘a ‘aposetolo makehe atu na.

He neongo nai ko e kapo kita ‘i he lea, ka tala‘ehai ‘oku ou pehē ‘i he ‘ilo me‘a loloto: kaekehe, ‘ilonga ha me‘a na‘a mau fai ki ai, na‘a mau ‘ai ke matala ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e kakai kotoa pē ke ‘aonga kiate kimoutolu.
Ka na‘a kuo u angahala ko ‘eku fakamā‘ulalo ke lava ai homou fakamā‘olunga, ‘ō? ‘A ‘eku malanga‘aki ‘a e Kōsipeli ‘a e ‘Otua kiate kimoutolu ta‘etotongi.
Na‘a ku fakamasiva ‘a e ngaahi siasi kehe, ‘o u ma‘u ‘oho mei ai ki he‘eku ngāue kiate kimoutolu.

Pea ‘i he‘eku ‘iate kimoutolu, pea faifai pea u masiva, ka tala‘ehai na‘a ku tuku tāupe ‘i ha taha: he na‘e fakaai hoku masiva ‘e he kāinga ‘i he‘enau omi mei Masitōnia. Pea ‘i he me‘a kotoa pē na‘a ku ta‘ofi au, ke ‘oua na‘a ku hoko ko e kavenga kiate kimoutolu; ‘io, pea te u ta‘ofi ai pē.
Ko e mo‘oni ‘a Kalaisi ‘oku ou fai‘aki, ‘o u pehē ‘e ‘ikai ta‘ofi au mei he pōlepole ko ia ‘i he ngaahi feitu‘u ‘o ‘Akeia.
Ko e hā nai? Ko e ‘ikai te u ‘ofa kiate kimoutolu, ‘ō? ‘Ā, ‘oku mea‘i ia ‘e he ‘Otua.

Ka ko e me‘a ‘oku ou fai, te u fai ai pē foki; koe‘uhi ke u motuhi ‘aupito ‘a e tu‘unga ‘o e fa‘ahinga na ‘oku fie ma‘u ha tu‘unga ki he‘enau lau; pea ke nau hoko ‘o hangē ko kimautolu ‘i he me‘a ko ia ‘oku nau pōlepole ai.
He ko e fa‘ahinga ko ia, ko e kau ‘aposetolo loi, ko e kau ngāue fakahekeheke: ‘oku nau ‘ai ai pē ‘a e anga ‘o e kau ‘aposetolo ‘a Kalaisi.
Pea ko hai ‘e ofo ai? He na‘a mo Sētane ‘oku ne ‘ai ‘a e anga ‘o ha ‘āngelo mei he maama.
Pea tala‘ehai ko e me‘a fakaofo ‘a e ‘ai ‘e he‘ene kau sevāniti ‘a e anga tofu pē ‘o e kau sevāniti ‘a faitotonu: ka ko e iku‘anga ‘o e fa‘ahinga ko ia ‘e fakatatau ki he‘enau ngāue.
Ka u foki ki he‘eku lea: ‘ofa ke ‘oua na‘a lau au ‘e ha taha ko e sesele: pea kapau ‘e ‘ikai lava ia, pe‘i tali pē au ‘aki ‘a e tali ‘o e sesele, koe‘uhi ke u fai mo au ha‘aku ki‘i pōlepole.
Ko e me‘a ‘oku ou teu lau, tala‘ehai ‘oku ou lau ko ‘eku ma‘u ha fa‘ifa‘itaki‘anga mei he ‘Eiki; ka ‘oku hangē kuo u puke fakasesele he‘eku falala pehē ki he pōlepole.
Ko eni ‘oku ‘i ai ha tokolahi ‘oku pōlepole fakakakano, ko ia ka u pōlepole mo au.
He seuke! ‘Oku mou kātaki fiemālie ‘a e kau sesele: kae fēfē, he ko e kau poto kimoutolu.

Seuke, ‘oku mou kātaki pē neongo ‘ene fakapōpula‘i kimoutolu ‘e ha taha, neongo ‘ene kai ‘o ‘osi ho‘omou me‘a, neongo ‘ene tauhele‘i kimoutolu, neongo ‘ene fakahīkihiki ia, neongo ‘ene sipi‘i homou mata, ka ‘oku mou kātaki ia.
Tā ‘oku hoa ‘eku lea mo hoku lau‘i, ‘a e pehē na‘a mau vaivai. Ka ‘ilonga ha me‘a ‘oku tu‘unga ai ha taha ‘ene mālohi, ko e me‘a ko ia ‘oku ou mālohi ai au (ko ‘eku fakasesele ‘eni ‘oku lea).
Ko e Hepelū koā kinautolu? pehē mo au. Ko e ‘Isileli kinautolu? pehē mo au, Ko e hako ‘o ‘Epalahame kinautolu? pehē mo au.
Ko e kau sevāniti ‘a Kalaisi kinautolu? (ka u lea hangē ha kua) makehe atu pē au: he hulu atu ‘eku fakafitefita‘a, he hulu atu ‘eku nofo pilīsone, he ngei hoku taa‘i, he tu‘o lahi ‘eku tei mate–
Ne tu‘o nima mālō hoku kaui‘imaea‘i ‘e he kakai Siu, pea ka nau ka fai, na‘e toe ‘a e hapo ‘e taha pea kakato ‘a e fāngofulu‘i hapo;
kuo tu‘o tolu hoku loholoho‘i faka-Loma, tu‘o taha hoku tolomaka‘i, tu‘o tolu ‘eku vaka mamate, ko e ‘aho kotoa mo e pō mo ‘eku kakau ‘i he moana–he‘eku fononga tu‘o lahi;

he‘eku fa‘a meimei tu‘utāmaki ‘i he ngaahi vaitafe, he‘eku fa‘a meimei tu‘utāmaki ‘i he ngaahi kaiha‘akau, he‘eku fa‘a meimei tu‘utāmaki ko e ngāue ‘a hoku fa‘ahinga, he‘eku fa‘a meimei tu‘utāmaki mei he Senitaile, he‘eku fa‘a meimei tu‘utāmaki ‘i kolo, he‘eku fa‘a meimei tu‘utāmaki ‘i tua‘ā, he‘eku fa‘a meimei tu‘utāmaki ‘i tahi, he‘eku fa‘a meimei tu‘utāmaki mei he kau lotu loi;
he fitefita‘a mo e ongosia, he‘eku fa‘a ‘ā fuoloa, he‘eku fiekaia mo fie inua, he‘eku fa‘a ‘aukai, he‘eku mokosia mo masiva kofu.
Pea ke ‘oua na‘a ku lau kotoa, ka ‘oku ‘i ai ‘eku kavenga ‘oku hilifaki mai ‘i he ‘aho kotoa pē, ko e lotomo‘ua he tauhi ‘o e ngaahi siasi.
‘Anefē ha vaivai ha taha, ‘o ‘ikai te u vaivai ai? ‘Anefē ha humu ha taha, ‘o ‘ikai te u vevela ai?
‘Ē, ka kuo pau ke u pōlepole, pea tā te u pole pē he‘eku ngaahi vaivai ‘anga.
Ko e ‘Otua mo Tamai ‘a e ‘Eiki ko Sīsū, ‘a ‘ene ‘Afio ‘oku ‘o‘ona ‘a e fakamālō ‘o lauikuonga, ‘oku ne mea‘i ‘oku ‘ikai te u loi.
‘I he‘eku ‘i Tāmasikusi, na‘e le‘ohi ‘a e kolo ‘o e kau Tāmasikusi ‘e he kōvana ‘a e tu‘i ko ‘Aletasi, ko ‘ene fie puke au:
pea na‘e fakahū au ‘i ha tupa ‘i ha kato, ‘o tukutukuhifo kitua‘ā, pea u hao meiate kinautolu.
TĀ kuo pau ke u pōlepole: pea neongo ‘e ‘ikai te u hā lelei ai, ka u fai atu pē ki he ngaahi vīsone, mo e fa‘a fakahā me‘a mei he ta‘ehāmai ‘e he ‘Eiki.

‘Oku ‘i ai ha tangata Kalisitiane ‘oku ou ‘ilo ki ai, pea ko hono hongofulu mā fā ta‘u ‘eni talu e me‘a ‘oku ou lau ki ai: na‘e punakaki ‘a e toko taha ko ia ki he langi tu‘o tolu: (‘oku ‘ikai te u ‘ilo pe na‘a ne sino, pea ‘oku ‘ikai te u ‘ilo pe kuo ne hiki mei he sino: ko e ‘Otua pē ‘oku ne mea‘i).
‘Io, ‘oku ou ‘ilo ha tangata na‘e pehe‘i; (hei‘ilo pe na‘e ‘ave mo e sino, pe na‘e tuku ‘a e sino; ko e ‘Otua pē ‘oku mea‘i):
tokua na‘e punakaki ia ki Palataisi; pea ne ongo‘i ai ha ngaahi lea tāpuhā, ‘a ia ‘oku ‘ikai ngofua ki ha tangata ke lea‘aki.
‘E ai ha‘aku pole ‘i ha toko taha ‘e pehe‘i; ka ‘e ‘ikai ha‘aku pole ‘ia kita tonu, ka ‘i hoku ngaahi vaivai‘anga pē.

Seuke, ka ne u loto ke pōlepole, tala‘ehai te u hā ko e sesele; he ko e tala fai tu‘unga te u fai. Ka neongo hono makehe atu ‘o e fakahā me‘a mei he ta‘ehāmai kiate au, ka ‘oku te faka‘ehi‘ehi mei he pōlepole ai; na‘a hulu atu hoku tokanga‘i ‘e ha taha ‘i he me‘a ‘oku ne vakai ‘iate au mo fanongo ‘iate au.
Ko ia, telia na‘a ku anga hiki ai, na‘e tuku mai ha foto ke nofo ‘i hoku kakano, ko e ‘āngelo ‘a Sētane, ke ne tukimononofoa au, ke ‘oua na‘a ku anga hiki.
Na‘e tu‘o tolu ‘eku kole ki he ‘Eiki ‘i he toko taha ko ia, ke ne hiki meiate au:

pea kuo ne folofola mai, ‘Oku fu‘u lahi ‘eku kelesi ki ho‘o me‘a; he ‘oku toki hā hono ivi kotoa he tu‘u ‘i he vaivai. Pea ka ko ia, pea tā te u fili mu‘a ke fai ‘eku pole vaivai ni, koe‘uhi ke hifo mai ‘a e ivi ‘o Kalaisi, ‘o fokotu‘u hono Tāpanekale ‘iate au.

Ko hono ‘uhinga ia ‘oku ou hōhō‘ia ai ‘i hoku ngaahi vaivai‘anga, ‘i he fa‘a pā‘usia, ‘i he fa‘a faingata‘a‘ia, ‘i he fa‘a fakatanga‘i, ‘i he fa‘a ‘efitu‘ua, koe‘uhi ko Kalaisi; he ka u ka vaivai, ko ‘eku toki mālohi ē.

Tā kuo u hoko ‘o sesele: ka na‘a mou loki au ki ai. Seuke, na‘e mei totonu mu‘a ke sani au ‘e kimoutolu: he tala‘ehai na‘a ku momo‘i tōmui ‘i he ha‘a ‘aposetolo makehe atu na; neongo ko e me‘a noa au.
Kehe na‘e feia ‘i homou lotolotonga, ‘i he funga ‘o ha fu‘u kātaki, ‘a e ngaahi faka‘ilonga ‘aposetolo, ko e ngaahi me‘a faka‘ilonga mo fakaofo, mo e ngaahi mana mo‘oni.
He ko e hā tū ha me‘a ne mou tōmui ai ‘i he ngaahi siasi kehe? Ngata pē ‘apē ‘i he ‘ikai te u fakamafasia kimoutolu ‘e au. ‘Ē, fakamolemole ‘eku ngāue kovi ko ia.

Vakai, kuo ‘osi ‘eni ‘eku teu ke ‘alu atu ko hono tu‘o tolu; ka ‘e ‘ikai te u fakamafasia ai kimoutolu; he ‘oku ‘ikai te u fiema‘u ho‘omou me‘a, ka ko kimoutolu ‘atā pē. He tala‘ehai ko e ngāue ‘a e fānau ke fokotu‘u koloa ma‘a e mātu‘a, ka ko e mātu‘a ma‘a e fānau:
ka ko au ‘oku ou mātu‘aki loto ke mahomo atu ‘eku me‘a, ‘io, ke ‘osi atu mo au foki koe‘uhi ko homou laumālie, neongo ‘e faka‘au hifo hoku ‘ofa‘i ‘i he tupulekina ‘eku ‘ofa atu.
Pea ko eni, tau tuku ko ia: tā na‘e ‘ikai te u fakamafasia kimoutolu ‘e au; ka ko ‘eku ma‘u kimoutolu, tokua, ‘aki ‘eku olo, he ko e tama kākā.
‘Ē, hono ai ha taha kuo u fekau atu, ‘o u ma‘u me‘a ai meiate kimoutolu, ‘ō?

Ne u kole ‘a Taitusi ke ‘alu atu, pea u fekau ke ‘alu mo ia ‘a e kāinga ‘e taha; ne ma‘u me‘a ‘a Taitusi meiate kimoutolu, ‘ō? ‘Ikai ‘oku taha tofu pē ‘a e anga na‘a ma fai‘aki ‘ema fakafeangai atu? ‘ikai na‘a ma topuva‘e taha?

Kuo loa ho‘omou lau, ‘oku mau fakamatala pehē ke mou fakatonuhia kimoutolu. ‘Ā, ko e ‘ao ‘o e ‘Otua ‘oku mau fai ai ‘emau lea, pea ‘oku mau tu‘u ‘ia Kalaisi: ka ko eni, si‘omau ‘ofa‘anga, ko ‘emau ngaahi me‘a kotoa pē ‘oku mo‘omou langa hake.

He ‘oku te manavahē na‘a ‘iloange te u ‘ilo kimoutolu, ‘i he‘eku a‘u atu, ‘oku mou fai kehe mo e me‘a ‘oku ou tangi ki ai: pea mou ‘ilo ai au foki, ‘oku ‘ikai te u hangē ko e me‘a te mou tangi ki ai. Na‘a ‘iloange ‘e hā ‘iate kimoutolu ha fetu‘usi, ha meheka, ‘a e fe‘ite‘itani, ‘a e fakafelaulauhi, ‘a e fefasitu‘u‘aki, ‘a e fefakakovi‘aki, ‘a e ta‘emīngao, mo e fakamaveuveu.

‘Io, ‘oku te manavahē na‘a toe fakatōkilalo au ‘e hoku ‘Otua ‘i he‘eku a‘u atu, koe‘uhi ko kimoutolu; pea ‘e ‘a‘aku ke tēngihia ha ni‘ihi ‘iate kinautolu kuo nau taukave ‘enau angahala ko ia, ‘o ‘ikai te nau fakatomala ‘i he anga‘uli, mo e fe‘auaki, mo e pau‘u, ‘a ia na‘a nau fai.
KO ‘eku ‘alu atu ‘eni mōku tu‘o tolu “Ilonga ha me‘a, ‘e fakapapau ki ai ‘i ha fakamo‘oni ‘a ha toko ua, kae‘uma‘ā ha toko tolu."

Na‘a ku sinaki tala mu‘a, pea ‘oku ou sinaki tala ‘eni–hangē ko ‘eku lea ‘i he‘eku ‘a‘ahi atu ko hono tu‘o ua, pehē mo ‘eku lea ko eni ‘i he‘eku kei mama‘o–‘oku ou tala kiate kimoutolu ‘oku taukave ho‘omou angahala mu‘a, pea ki homou toe kātoa.

‘E ‘ikai te u fakama‘uma‘u ‘i he‘eku ‘alu atu ka fai ni: ko e me‘a ‘i ho‘omou tangi ki ha fakamo‘oni ‘o e lea ‘a Kalaisi ‘iate au. Tala‘ehai ko ha ngali vaivai ia ‘i he fai atu, kaekehe ‘oku ne ngāue mālohi ‘iate kimoutolu.

Seuke, ‘oku mo‘oni na‘e kalusefai ia ko ‘ene vaivai, ka ‘oku ne mo‘ui ko ‘ene mālohi mei he ‘Otua; pea ‘oku mo‘oni ‘oku mau vaivai fakataha mo ia, ka te mau mo‘ui fakataha mo ia ‘i he fai kiate kimoutolu, ko ‘emau mālohi mei he ‘Otua.

‘Ē, mou sivi mu‘a kimoutolu, pe ‘oku mou lotu mo‘oni; ‘eke fakamo‘oni meiate kimoutolu. ‘Io, na‘a ‘oku ‘ikai te mou ongona ‘a e ‘iate kimoutolu ‘a Sīsū Kalaisi; ka na‘a ko e kau ta‘e-ha-fakamo‘oni kimoutolu.
Ka ‘oku te pehē te mou ‘ilo ‘oku ‘ikai ko e kau ta‘e-ha-fakamo‘oni ‘a kimautolu.
Ka ‘oku mau hū ki he ‘Otua ke ‘oua ‘aupito te mou fai ha kovi; ‘o ‘ikai te mau lotu ke hā ‘emau mo‘oni, ka ke fai lelei ‘e kimoutolu, ka mau nofo ‘o hangē ‘oku ‘ikai ha‘amau fakamo‘oni.
He ‘oku ‘ikai te mau mālohi ke fai ha me‘a ki he totonu, ka ke kauhaki‘i ‘a e totonu.
Seuke, ko ‘emau toki fiefia ē, ‘i ha‘amau vaivai ka mou mālohi: pea ko e me‘a ko eni ‘oku mau lotua, ‘io, ‘a ho‘omou toe ma‘opo‘opo lelei.

Ko hono ‘uhinga ia ‘oku ou tohi pehē ai kei mama‘o; telia na‘a ku fai māsila ‘i he‘eku ‘iate kimoutolu, ‘i he‘eku ngāue‘aki ‘eku pule, ‘a ia na‘e tuku ‘e he ‘Eiki kiate au ke fai‘aki ha langa hake, ‘o ‘ikai ha holoki hifo.

Ko ‘eku lea faka‘osi ‘eni, kāinga: mou fiefia pē, mou fakamā‘opo‘opo kimoutolu, tali ‘eku fakafiemālie, mou loto taha, mou nonofo melino; pea ko e ‘Otua ‘o e ‘ofa mo e melino te ne toki kau mo kimoutolu.
Mou fefekita‘aki ‘aki ha ‘uma tapu. ‘Oku ‘ofa atu ‘a e kāinga lotu kotoa pē.
Ko e kelesi ‘a e ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi, mo e ‘ofa ‘a e ‘Otua, mo e feohi ‘o e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni, ‘ofa ke ‘iate kimoutolu kotoa pē ia.

TŪ KO KIMAUTOLU–‘a Paula ko ha ‘aposetolo, (ka na‘e ‘ikai tupu ‘eku lakanga mei ha tu‘unga tangata, ‘uma‘ā hano ‘omi ‘e ha tangata, ka na‘e ‘omi ‘e Sīsū Kalaisi, pea mo e ‘Otua ko e Tamai, ‘a ia na‘a ne fokotu‘u ia mei he pekia);
pea mo e kāinga lotu kotoa pē ‘oku fononga mo au–ko ‘emau tohi ki he ngaahi siasi ‘o Kalētia.
‘Ofa ke mou ma‘u kelesi mo e fiemālie mei he ‘Otua ko e Tamai, mo hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi,
‘a ‘Ene ‘Afio na‘a ne foaki ia ‘e ia koe‘uhi ko ‘etau ngaahi angahala, ke ne fakahaofi kitautolu mei he nofo kovi ‘oku lolotonga ni: ‘o fakatatau ki he finangalo ‘o e ‘Otua ko ‘etau Tamai.
Ke ‘o ‘Ene ‘Afio ‘a e kolōlia ‘o lauikuonga pea ta‘engata! ‘Ēmeni.
‘Oku te ofo ‘i he vave pehē fau ho‘omou kamata tafoki meiate ia na‘a ne fakaului kimoutolu ‘aki ‘a e kelesi ‘a Kalaisi, ‘o mou hiki ki ha kōsipeli kehe.
‘A ia ‘oku ‘ikai ko ha kōsipeli; kehe ‘oku ai ha ni‘ihi ‘oku ue‘i kimoutolu, mo nau feinga ke liliu ‘a e Kōsipeli ‘o Kalaisi.
Ka neongo ko kimautolu, pe ko ha ‘āngelo mei Langi, ka ‘o kapau te ne malanga‘aki ha kōsipeli ‘oku makehe atu mo ia na‘a mau malanga‘aki atu, ke ne hoko ko e mala‘ia.
Hangē ko ‘emau lea mu‘a, ko ia ‘oku ou toe tala ni, kapau ‘e malanga‘aki atu ‘e ha taha ha kōsipeli ‘oku makehe atu mo ia na‘a mou ma‘u, ke ne hoko ko e mala‘ia.

He ko e fē ‘eni ‘oku ou fai ke loto mai? ‘a e kakai, pe ko e ‘Otua? Pe ko ‘eku feinga ‘eni ke mālie‘ia ‘a e kakai? Ka ne u kei fai ke mālie‘ia ‘a e kakai ‘iate au, pehē ‘oku ‘ikai te u nofo ni ko ha pōpula ‘a Kalaisi.
Pea ko eni, kāinga, ‘oku ou fakamahino atu, ko e kōsipeli ne malanga‘aki ‘e au, ‘oku ‘ikai ko ha me‘a fakaetangata ia.
He ko ‘ete ma‘u ia foki ‘e kita, tala‘ehai ko e ma‘u mei ha tangata, pe ‘i he‘ete ako, ka ko e fakahā mei he ta‘ehāmai ‘e Sīsū Kalaisi.
He na‘a mou fanongo ki he‘eku tō‘onga mu‘a ‘i he lotu faka-Siu; ‘a e makehe atu ‘o ‘eku fakatanga‘i ‘a e siasi ‘a e ‘Otua, mo ‘eku laiki ia:
mo ‘eku ‘amo atu ‘i he tokolahi ‘o hoku kakai na‘e to‘ume‘a mo au ‘i he lotu faka-Siu, ‘o u hulu atu ‘i he mamahi‘i ‘o e ngaahi tu‘utu‘uni na‘e tukufakaholo mei he‘eku ngaahi kui.
Ka ko e ‘Otua, ‘a ia na‘a ne polo‘i au mei he manava ‘o ‘eku fa‘ē, mo ne ui au ‘aki ‘ene kelesi.

‘I he ‘iloange na‘a ne finangalo ke faka‘ilo mei he ta‘ehāmai ‘a hono ‘Alo ‘i hoku loto, koe‘uhi ke u ongoongoa ai pē ia ‘i he lotolotonga ‘o e Senitaile; ko e me‘a na‘a ku fai leva na‘e ‘ikai te u huhū ki ha kakano mo toto,
‘uma‘ā ha‘aku ‘alu hake ki Selusalema kiate kinautolu na‘e tomu‘a ‘aposetolo ‘iate au, ka te ‘alu pē mei he potu ko ia ki ‘Ālepea, pea u toe foki mei ai ki Tāmasikusi.
Pea na‘e toki hili ‘a e ta‘u ‘e tolu, pea u ‘alu hake ki Selusalema ke ‘a‘ahi kia Kīfasi; pea u nofo mo ia ‘o ‘aho hongofulu mā nima.
Ka na‘e ‘ikai te ma fe‘iloaki mo ha taha kehe ‘o e kau ‘Aposetolo, ko Sēmisi pē ko e tokoua ‘o e ‘Eiki.
Pea ko e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku ou tohi atu, ko e ‘Otua ē, ‘oku ‘ikai ko ‘eku loi.
Hili ia na‘a ku ‘alu ki he ngaahi feitu‘u ‘o Sīlia mo Silisia:
pea u nofo ai pē, ‘o ‘ikai ‘iloa hoku mata ni ‘e he ngaahi siasi ‘o Siutea na‘e Kalisitiane:
ka na‘e ngata pē ‘i he‘enau fa‘a ma‘u talanoa, Tokua, ko ia na‘a ne fakatanga mu‘a kiate kitautolu, ‘oku ne malanga‘aki ‘eni ‘a e lotu na‘a ne motu‘a laiki.
Pea nau fakahīkihiki‘i ‘a e ‘Otua he‘ene hā ‘iate au.
PEA ‘i he‘ene ‘osi ai pē ‘a e ta‘u ‘e hongofulu mā fā, pea u toe ‘alu hake ki Selusalema fakataha mo Pānepasa: pea u ‘alu mo au ‘a Taitusi foki.

Pea ko ‘eku ‘alu ko ia na‘e ‘i he funga ‘o ha fekau mei he Ta‘ehāmai. Pea na‘a ku fakapā kiate kinautolu ‘i he kōsipeli ‘oku ou malanga‘aki ni ki he Senitaile, kae fakaekimautolu pē mo e kau tu‘ukimu‘a, na‘a ‘iloange ‘e iku noa ‘a e lele ‘oku ou fai, pe ko ia kuo u fai.
Ka na‘a mo Taitusi, ‘a ia na‘e ‘alu mo au, neongo ko e Kalisi, ka na‘e ‘ikai kouna ke ne kamu:
ka koe‘uhi pē ko e kau lotu loi kuo moulu mai, ‘a e fa‘ahinga na‘a nau totolo mai ke mataki‘i ‘a e tau‘atāina ‘oku tau ma‘u ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū, ka nau fai ke fakapōpula‘i ‘aupito kitautolu:
‘a ia na‘e ‘ikai te mau momo‘i ‘unua ki ai ‘i ha houa ‘e taha, ke fai ‘a e fakavaivai na‘a nau tangi ki ai; koe‘uhi ke nofo ma‘u kiate kimoutolu ‘a e totonu ‘o e Kōsipeli.

Ka ko e me‘a kiate kinautolu ‘oku lau ko ha me‘a, (ko ia ai pē pe na‘a nau fēfē ‘i mu‘a, ko e hā ia kiate au? Tala‘ehai ‘oku filifilimānako ‘e he ‘Otua ki he tangata) seuke, na‘e ‘ikai ‘omi ha me‘a kiate au ‘e he kau tu‘ukimu‘a na.
Kaekehe, ‘i he‘enau vakai kuo tu‘anaki au, ‘o tuku mai ‘a e Kōsipeli ma‘a e ta‘ekamu, ‘o hangē ā kia Pita ma‘a e kamu;
(he ko ia na‘a ne tokoni ma‘a Pita ke ne lava ‘ene ngāue faka‘aposetolo ki he ha‘a Kamu, na‘a ne tokoni foki ma‘aku ke u lava ‘eku ngāue ki he Senitaile):

‘io, ko Sēmisi mo Kīfasi mo Sione, ‘a ia ‘oku lau ko e ngaahi pou, ‘i he‘enau vakai ‘a e kelesi kuo tuku mai kiate au, na‘a nau tuku mai kiate au mo Pānepasa ‘a e nima to‘omata‘u ‘o e kautaha, koe‘uhi ke ‘amaua ‘a e ngāue ki he Senitaile, kae ‘anautolu ‘a e fai ki he ha‘a Kamu.
Ngata pē, na‘a nau kole ke ma manatua ‘a e kau masiva; ‘a ia foki ko e me‘a pē na‘a ku mātu‘aki loto ke fai.
Pea ‘i he hoko mai ‘a Kīfasi ki ‘Aniteoke, na‘a ku tu‘u ke ta‘ofi tonu kiate ia; he na‘e mahino ‘ene hala.

Koe‘uhi ‘i he te‘eki ke hoko hifo ha ni‘ihi meia Sēmisi, na‘a ne keinanga fakataha mo e Senitaile: ka ‘i he‘enau hoko hifo leva, na‘a ne kamata faka‘ehi‘ehi ‘o nofo kehe, he‘ene manavahē telia ‘a ha‘a kamu.
Pea fai mālualoi mo ia ‘a hono toe ‘o e kau Siu: ko ia na‘a mo Pānepasa na‘e ‘auhia ‘i he mālualoi ‘anautolu.

Ka ‘i he‘eku vakai ‘oku ‘ikai ke hu‘ufa tonu ‘enau laka ki he mo‘oni ‘o e Kōsipeli, ko ia na‘a ku lea kia Kīfasi ‘i he ‘ao ‘onautolu kotoa, ‘o pehē, Kapau ‘oku ke mo‘ui faka-Senitaile, ‘o ‘ikai faka-Siu, ‘a koe ko e Siu, pea fakafēfē ai ho‘o tohoaki ‘a e Senitaile ke fai faka-Siu.
Neongo ko e tupu Siu kitaua, ‘o ‘ikai ko e ongo angahala mei he Senitaile,

ka ‘i he‘eta ‘ilo ‘oku ‘ikai fakatonuhia ha tangata mei he ngaahi ngāue faka-Lao, kae ngata pē ‘i he tui kia Sīsū Kalaisi, ko ia, ko kitaua foki na‘a ta tui kia Kalaisi Sīsū, koe‘uhi ke ta ma‘u fakatonuhia mei he tui kia Kalaisi, ‘o ‘ikai mei he ngaahi ngāue faka-Lao: koe‘uhi ko e me‘a ki he ngaahi ngāue faka-Lao, ‘e tu‘u mola ai ‘a e kakano kotoa pē, ‘o ‘ikai hanau fakatonuhia mei ai.

Pea kapau, lolotonga ‘eta nofo ke ma‘u tonuhia he tu‘u ‘ia Kalaisi, fakafokifā kuo hā ko e ongo angahala foki kitaua, pea tā kuo hoko ‘a Kalaisi ko e tokoni ‘o angahala, ‘ikai ko ia? Molekemama‘o ha me‘a pehē!
Seuke, kapau kuo te holoki ha ngaahi me‘a, ka te hanga ‘o toe langa hake ‘a e ngaahi me‘a pē ko ia, tā ‘oku ou fakamo‘oni ‘e au ko e fai hala au.
He ko kita, ko e me‘a ‘i he Lao na‘a te mate ki he Lao; koe‘uhi ke u mo‘ui ki he ‘Otua.

Kuo tutuki au ki he Kolosi mo Kalaisi: pea ko ‘eku mo‘ui ‘oku fai, ‘oku ‘ikai kei ko au, ka ko e mo‘ui ‘oku fai ‘e Kalaisi ‘iate au: ‘io, ko e mo‘ui ‘oku ou fai ‘eni ‘i he kakano ko e mo‘ui ‘i he tui, ko e tui ki he ‘Alo ‘o e ‘Otua, ‘a ia na‘a ne ‘ofeina au, mo ne foaki ia ‘e ia ke pekia koe‘uhi ko au.
‘Oku ‘ikai te te fakata‘e‘aonga ‘e kita ‘a e kelesi ‘a e ‘Otua; he kapau ‘oku fou mei he Lao ‘a e mā‘oni‘oni, pea tā na‘e pekia ‘a Kalaisi ta‘ehano ‘uhinga.
‘A e kau Kalētia ta‘eloto, ko hai kuo ne fakamatavalea‘i kimoutolu? ‘A kimoutolu na‘e fehangahangai tonu mo homou mata ‘a Sīsū Kalaisi, hono faka‘ali‘ali ‘o hono kalusefai.
Ko e me‘a pē ‘eni ‘oku ou fie ‘ilo meiate kimoutolu, pe na‘a mou ma‘u ‘a e Laumālie mei he ngaahi ngāue faka-Lao, pe mei he malanga‘aki ‘o e tui?
‘Oku pehē fau ho‘omou ta‘eloto? hili ho‘omou kamata ‘i he Laumālie, ‘oku mou nofo ‘eni koā ke fakakakato mei he kakano?
Ne mou kātaki koā ‘a e ngaahi fu‘u mamahi ko ia ko e me‘a ke ta‘e‘aonga? ‘O kapau mo‘oni kuo ta‘e‘aonga.
Pea ko eni, ko ia ‘oku ne tuku kiate kimoutolu ‘a e Laumālie, mo ne fakatupu ‘iate kimoutolu ‘a e mafai mana, ‘oku tefito ‘ene fai ki he ngaahi ngāue faka-Lao, pe ki he malanga‘aki ‘o e tui?
‘Ā, ‘oku hangē pē ko e folofola, Na‘e tui ‘a ‘Epalahame ki he ‘Otua, pea na‘e lau ia ma‘ane mā‘oni‘oni.
Ko ia, ‘oku mou vakai mei ai, ‘Ilonga ‘a kinautolu ‘oku ‘i he tui, ko kinautolu ia ‘a e hako ‘o ‘Epalahame.

Pea ko e Tohitapu, ‘i he‘ene vakai mama‘o ‘i mu‘a ‘a e fakatonuhia ‘e he ‘Otua ‘a e Senitaile mei he tui pē, ko ia na‘a ne malanga‘aki ‘a e Kōsipeli ‘i mu‘a kia ‘Epalahame, ‘o pehē, ‘E monū‘ia ‘iate koe ‘a e fa‘ahinga kotoa pē.
Ko ia, ko kinautolu ‘oku ‘i he tui, te nau monū‘ia fakataha mo si‘i tui ko ‘Epalahame.

Seuke, ‘ilonga kinautolu ‘oku tefito ki he ngaahi ngāue faka-Lao, te nau mo‘ulaloa ki ha mala: he kuo tohi, ‘oku mala‘ia ‘a e tangata kotoa pē ‘oku ‘ikai ke nofo‘aki fai ‘a e ngaahi me‘a kotoa pē kuo tohi ‘i he Tohi Lao.
Pea ko eni, ko e pehē ‘oku ‘ikai fakatonuhia ha toko taha ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e ‘Otua he‘ene tu‘unga ki he Lao, ‘oku mahino ia mei he folofola ni, Ko e mā‘oni‘oni te ne mo‘ui mei he tui.
Ka ko e Lao ‘oku ‘ikai tefito ki he tui: ka ‘oku pehē ‘e he Folofola, Ko ia kuo ne fai ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ko ia te ne mo‘ui ai.
Ne huhu‘i kitautolu ‘e Kalaisi mei he mala‘ia faka-Lao, he‘ene hoko ko e koto mala‘ia koe‘uhi ko kitautolu; (he kuo tohi, ‘Ilonga ‘a ia ‘oku tautau ‘i ha ‘akau ko e mala‘ia ia):
koe‘uhi ke hoko ki he Senitaile ‘ia Sīsū Kalaisi ‘a e tāpuaki ‘a ‘Epalahame; ka tau ma‘u ‘i he‘etau tui ‘a e tala‘ofa, ko e Laumālie.
Kāinga, ka u lea fakaetangata: neongo ko e fuakava ‘a ha tangata, ka ‘o kapau kuo fakapapau ia, tala‘ehai ‘oku tāmate‘i ia ‘e ha taha, pe fakalahi.

Pea ko eni, na‘e fai ‘a e ngaahi tala‘ofa ma‘a ‘Epalahame mo hono hako. ‘Oku ‘ikai te ne pehē, Pea mo ho ngaahi hako, ‘o hangē ko ha‘ane lau ki ha tokolahi; ka hangē ko ‘ene lau ki ha toko taha pē, ‘o pehē, Pea mo ho hako: ‘a ia ko Kalaisi.

Pea ko ‘eni ia ‘a e me‘a ‘oku ou lau ki ai, ko e Fuakava ‘a ia kuo loa hono fakapapau ‘e he ‘Otua, ‘e ‘ikai lava ‘e he Lao ke vete ia, ‘o fakaka‘anga ‘a e Tala‘ofa: he na‘e ki mui ‘ene hoko ‘a‘ana, kuo hili ‘a e ta‘u ‘e fāngeau mā tolungofulu.
He kapau na‘e tefito ki he Lao ‘a e ma‘u ‘o e tofi‘a, tā ‘oku ‘ikai tefito ki he Tala‘ofa: ka na‘e tō ia kia ‘Epalahame ko e me‘a‘ofa ‘a e ‘Otua, koe‘uhi ko e Tala‘ofa.

Pea kapau ko ia, pea ko e hā ai ‘a e Lao? ‘Ā, na‘e kanoni ‘aki ia koe‘uhi ko e ngaahi fai hala, kae‘oua ke hoko mai ‘a e hako ne fai ki ai ‘a e tala‘ofa; pea na‘e talafono ‘aki ‘e ha kau ‘āngelo, ‘o fakafai ‘i ha fakalaloa.
Pea ko eni, ko ha fakalaloa ‘oku ‘ikai ko ha me‘a ‘o ha fa‘ahi taha: ka ko e ‘Otua ‘oku taha tofu pē.

Pea kapau ko ia, pea ‘oku fepaki koā ‘a e Lao mo e ngaahi tala‘ofa ‘a e ‘Otua, ‘ō? Molekemama‘o! seuke ka ne ‘omi ha lao ‘a ia te ne lava ke fakamo‘ui ‘a e mate, pehē ‘e tefito mo‘oni ‘a e fakatonuhia ki he Lao.
Kaekehe na‘e loki ‘e he folofola ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē ke mo‘ulaloa ki he angahala, koe‘uhi ke foaki ‘a e tala‘ofa ki he kakai tui, koe‘uhi pē ko e tui kia Sīsū Kalaisi.
Ka ‘i he te‘eki ke hoko mai ‘a e tui, na‘e tauhi pilīsone kitaua ‘i he pule ‘a Lao, ‘o loki ki he tui na‘e ene ke faka‘ilo mei he Ta‘ehāmai.
Pea tā ko e Lao ko hota fakale‘o ma‘a Kalaisi, kae fakatonuhia kitaua mei he tui.
Ka ‘i he hoko mai ko eni ‘a e tui, pea ‘oku ‘ikai te ta kei fāiekina ki ha fakale‘o.
Seuke, ko e ngaahi Foha ‘o e ‘Otua ‘a kimoutolu kotoa pē, ko e me‘a ‘i he tui ‘oku fai kia Kalaisi Sīsū.
‘Io, ‘ilonga kimoutolu na‘e papitaiso kia Kalaisi, na‘a mou kofu ‘aki ai ‘a Kalaisi.
‘Oku ‘ikai ai ha Siu pe ha Kalisi, ‘oku ‘ikai ai ha pōpula pe ha tau‘atāina, ‘oku ‘ikai ai ke tangata mo fefine: he ko kimoutolu kātokatoa ko e toko taha tofu pē ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū.
Pea kapau ko e konga ‘o Kalaisi ‘a kimoutolu, pea tā ko e hako ‘o ‘Epalahame ‘a kimoutolu, ko e ngaahi ‘ea ‘o fakatatau ki he Tala‘ofa.
PEA ko eni, ‘oku te pehē, Lolotonga ‘oku tamasi‘i ‘a e ‘ea, ‘oku ‘ikai si‘i te ne fai kehekehe mo ha pōpula, neongo ko e ‘eiki ia ‘oku ‘a‘ana ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē:
kaekehe ‘oku ne mo‘ulaloa ki ha ni‘ihi ‘oku tauhi ia, mo ha ni‘ihi ‘oku tauhi ‘ene koloa; kae‘oua ke hokosia ‘a e taimi ne kotofa ‘e he‘ene ‘eiki.
Pehē mo kitaua; lolotonga na‘a ta tamaiki, na‘a ta mo‘ulaloa ki he ngaahi ‘elemēniti ‘o e lotu, ‘a ia ‘oku fakamaama, ‘o ta pōpula pē.
Ka ‘i he hokosia leva ‘a e fakakakato ‘o e taimi, na‘e fekau atu ‘e he ‘Otua hono ‘Alo ‘o‘ona, ‘a ia ne tupu mei ha fefine, mo tupu ko e mo‘ulaloa ki he Lao;
koe‘uhi ā ke ne huhu‘i ‘a kinautolu ‘oku mo‘ulaloa ki he Lao, ka tau ma‘u ‘a e ohi.
Pea koe‘uhi ā ko e ngaahi foha ‘a kimoutolu, ko ia na‘e fekau atu ‘e he ‘Otua ki hotau loto ‘a e Laumālie ‘o hono ‘Alo, ‘oku ne kalanga, ‘Apā, Tamai.
Ko ia ‘oku ‘ikai te ke kei ko ha pōpula, ka ko ha foha: pea kapau ko ha foha, pea tā ko ha ‘ea, ko e me‘a ‘i he ‘Otua.
Ka ko eni, ko e taimi mu‘a, na‘a mou ngāue ki ha ni‘ihi na‘e ‘ikai ko e ngaahi ‘otua mo‘oni, ko e ‘ikai te mou ‘ilo ki he ‘Otua.

Ka ‘i onopooni, kuo hili ho‘omou ‘ilo ‘a e ‘Otua, kae‘uma‘ā homou ‘iloa ‘e he ‘Otua, pea ‘oku fakafēfē ho‘omou toe tafoki ki he ngaahi ‘elemēniti vaivai mo masiva ko ia, ‘a ia ‘oku mou tangi ni ke ngāue ki ai, ‘o toe fai mei he kamata‘anga?
‘Oku mou tauhi ha ngaahi ‘aho mo ha ngaahi māhina, mo ha ngaahi fa‘ahita‘u mo ha ngaahi ta‘u.
‘Ā, ‘oku ou manavahē kiate kimoutolu, na‘a kuo ta‘e‘aonga ‘eku fakaongosia ne fai ma‘amoutolu.
Kāinga, ‘oku ou kole atu ke mou hoko ‘o hangē ko au, he na‘a ku hoko foki ‘o hangē ko kimoutolu.
Tala‘ehai na‘a mou momo‘i fai ha kovi kiate au: ka ‘oku mou ‘ilo na‘a ku fuofua malanga‘aki ‘a e Kōsipeli kiate kimoutolu koe‘uhi ko ha vaivai na‘e hoko ki hoku kakano.

Pea ko e me‘a na‘e tu‘u ‘i hoku kakano, ‘a ia na‘e ngali ko ha tūkia‘anga kiate kimoutolu, na‘e ‘ikai te mou fakata‘eta‘etokanga ai, ‘uma‘ā ha‘amou palakū‘ia ai; kaekehe na‘a mou tali au ‘o hangē ko ha ‘āngelo ‘a e ‘Otua, pe ko Sīsū Kalaisi.
Pea ko e fē ‘eni ho‘omou lau monū na‘e fai? He ‘oku ou fakamo‘oni atu, ka ne lava, pehē ne mou kape‘i homou mata ‘o ‘omi mo‘oku.
Pea tā kuo u hoko ko homou fili ‘apē, he‘eku lea ‘asi?
‘Ā, ko ‘enau mamahi‘i kimoutolu ‘oku ‘ikai lelei: kaekehe ko honau loto ke vahe‘i kimoutolu, ka mou toki mamahi‘i kinautolu.
Ka ko e me‘a lelei ke mamahi‘i ai pē kimoutolu ‘e ha ni‘ihi, ‘i ha me‘a ‘oku lelei, ‘o ‘ikai ngata pē ‘i he‘eta feangai mo au.
Si‘eku fānau valevale, ‘a kimoutolu ‘oku ou toe langā ‘eni ‘i homou fā‘ele‘i, kae‘oua ke kakato ‘a Kalaisi ‘iate kimoutolu,
‘ā, ‘oku te ‘amusia ange ‘e kita ‘oku ta feangai ‘eni, ka u liliu ‘a e anga ‘o ‘eku lea: he ‘oku ou puputu‘u koe‘uhi ko kimoutolu.
Tala mai, ‘a kimoutolu kuo mou loto ke mo‘ulaloa ki he Lao, ‘oku ‘ikai te mou tokanga‘i koā ‘a e Lao?
He kuo tohi ai, Tokua na‘e ma‘u ‘e ‘Epalahame ha ongo foha ‘e toko ua; ko e taha ko e tama ‘a e kaunanga, ko e taha ko e tama ‘a e fefine tau‘atāina.
Ka ko e tama ‘a e kaunanga na‘e tupu fakaekakano, ka ko e tama ‘a e fefine tau‘atāina na‘e fou fakapalōmesi mai.
Ko e fa‘ahinga me‘a pehē ‘oku fai fakatātā: he ko e ongo fefine ko ia, ko e ongo Fuakava; ko e taha ‘oku mei he mo‘unga ko Sainai, pea ‘oku fanau kakai ke pōpula: ko Heka‘ā ia.
Ka ko e Heka‘ā ko ia ko e mo‘unga ko Sainai ‘i ‘Ālepea: pea ‘oku hoa ia mo e Selusalema ‘o onopooni, he ‘oku nofo pōpula ia mo ‘ene fānau.
Ka ko e Selusalema mei ‘olunga ‘oku tau‘atāina ia: pea ko ia ia ‘a e fa‘ē ‘atautolu.
He kuo tohi, Fiefia, si‘i pa‘a ‘oku ‘ikai ke fanau, Hiki tuē mo kalanga, si‘i ta‘elangā! He ‘e tokolahi pē ha fānau ‘a si‘i li‘ekina, ‘O hulu atu ‘i he fefine ‘oku ‘i ai ‘a e tangata.
Pea ko eni, ko kimoutolu, kāinga, ko e fānau ‘a Palōmesi, ‘o hangē ko ‘Aisake.
Kae hangē tofu pē ko ia ‘i mu‘a, ‘a e fakatanga‘i ‘e ia na‘e tupu fakaekakano ‘a ia na‘e tupu fakalaumālie, ‘oku pehē pē foki mo ia ‘i onopooni.
Ka ko e hā ‘a e lau ‘a e Tohi? ‘A ‘eni, Kapusi ‘a e kaunanga mo ‘ene tama; he ‘e ‘ikai ‘aupito kaungā ‘ea ‘a e tama ‘a kaunanga mo e tama ‘a tau‘atāina.
Ko ia, kāinga, ‘oku ‘ikai ko e fānau ‘a kaunanga ‘a kitaua, ka ko e fānau ‘a tau‘atāina.
KO E tau‘atāina koā na‘e fakatau‘atāina kitaua ki ai ‘e Kalaisi? Pe‘i mou tu‘u ma‘u ai, pea ‘oua te mou toe mo‘ua ‘i he ‘ioke fakapōpula.
Vakai mai: ko Paula au ‘oku ou tala atu, kapau te mou fai‘aki ‘a e kamu, ‘e ‘ikai momo‘i ‘aonga ‘a Kalaisi kiate kimoutolu.
‘Io, ‘oku ou toe fakapapau atu ki he tangata takitaha ‘oku tuku ‘eni ke nau fai hono kamu, ‘oku ne mo‘ua leva ke fai hono kotoa ‘o e Lao.
Kuo motuhi leva kimoutolu meia Kalaisi, ‘a e fa‘ahinga na ‘oku nofo ke tonuhia mei he Lao: ‘io, kuo fakahee‘i kimoutolu meia Kelesi.
He ko kimautolu, ko e me‘a ‘i he Laumālie, pea koe‘uhi ko ‘emau tui, ‘oku mau talitali ‘aki ‘a e ‘amanaki ki he fakatonuhia.
He ‘i he tu‘u ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū, ‘oku ‘ikai mamafa ha‘ate kamu pe ta‘ekamu, ka ko ha tui pē ‘oku ngāue fou ‘i he ofa.
‘Ā, ne mālō ho‘omou lele. Ko hai tū ne ta‘ofi kimoutolu mei he talangofua ki he totonu?
Ko homou fakaloto‘i ko ia, ‘oku ‘ikai fou meiate ia ‘oku fai homou fakaului.
Ka lave ha me‘i lēvani ki ha takaonga mā, tā kuo lēvani hono kotoa.
‘Oku ‘i ai ‘eku falala ‘a‘aku kiate kimoutolu ‘i he ‘Eiki, ‘e ‘ikai momo‘i fou kehe homou loto: ka ko ia ‘oku ne fakatupu maveuveu ‘iate kimoutolu te ne fua hono tautea, neongo pe ko hai ia.
Ka ko e me‘a kiate au, kāinga; ka ne mo‘oni ‘oku ou kei malanga‘aki ‘a e kamu, pea ko e hā ai hoku fakatanga‘i ‘oku fai? he ka ne u fai pehē, pehē kuo ‘osi ‘a e fehi‘anekina ‘o e Kolosi.
Ko hoku loto ki he kakai ‘oku fakaangatu‘u kimoutolu, Taumaiā ke nau fai atu ‘o tu‘usi ‘aupito!
Seuke, na‘e ui kimoutolu, kāinga, ke mou tau‘atāina; kae‘oua pē ‘e iku ho‘omou tau‘atāina ko ha ava ki he kakano; ka ko e me‘a ‘i ho‘omou ‘ofa ke mou nofo fetamaio‘eiki‘aki.
He ‘oku ‘osiki ‘a e Lao kotoa ‘i ha fo‘i lea; ‘a ‘eni, Te ke ‘ofa ki ho kaungā‘api ‘o hangē ko ho‘o ‘ofa kiate koe.
Ka ‘o kapau te mou fe‘u‘usi mo fekainaki, vakai na‘a ‘iloange te mou fetāmate‘aki kimoutolu.
Pea ko ‘eku lea ‘eni, Mou fou ‘i he Laumālie, pea ‘e ‘ikai ai te mou momo‘i fakaai ‘a e holi ‘a Kakano.

He ‘oku holitu‘u ‘a Kakano ‘o fakafepaki ki he Laumālie; pea pehē mo e Laumālie kia Kakano: he ‘oku na feta‘ofi‘aki ‘a e ongo me‘a ko ia, koe‘uhi ka ai ha me‘a ‘oku mou loto ke fai, pea ‘oua te mou fai ia.
Ka ‘o kapau ‘oku tākiekina kimoutolu ‘e he Laumālie, tā ‘oku ‘ikai te mou mo‘ulaloa ki he Lao.
Pea ko eni, ‘oku mātu‘aki e‘a ‘a e ngaahi ngāue ‘a Kakano, ‘o pehē, Ko e fe‘auaki, ko e anga‘uli, ko e pau‘u,
ko e tauhi ‘aitoli, ko e fai tuki, ko e fetāufehi‘a‘aki, ko e fetu‘usi, ko e meheka, ko e fe‘ite‘itani, ko e fakafelaulauhi, ko e fakavahavaha‘a, ko e fakafa‘afa‘ahi,

ko e femeheka‘aki, ko e fefakapōngaki, ko e fa‘a konā, ko e fa‘a kai, mo e ngaahi alā me‘a pehē: ‘a ia ‘oku ou sinaki tala atu, ‘o hangē ko ‘eku lea mu‘a, ko e kakai fai me‘a pehē, ‘e ‘ikai hanau tofi‘a ‘i he pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otua.
Ka ko e fua ‘o e Laumālie, ko e ‘ofa, ko e fiefia, ko e melino, ko e anga mokomoko, ko e anga‘ofa, ko e anga tonu,
ko e anga falala, ko e anga kātaki, ko e anga fakama‘uma‘u: ‘oku ‘ikai ha lao ke ta‘ofi ‘a e ngaahi me‘a pehē
Pea ko kinautolu ‘oku ‘o Kalaisi Sīsū, na‘a nau tutuki ki he Kolosi ‘a e kakano mo hono ngaahi o‘i mo e holi.
Kapau ko e Laumālie ‘oku tau mo‘ui ai, tau laka foki ‘i he Laumālie.
‘Oua na‘a tau hiki ki he fie ongoongo, ‘o fepolepolei mo femeheka‘aki.

KĀINGA, neongo pē ‘e puke nima ha taha lolotonga ‘ene fai ha kovi; ka ko kimoutolu, ‘a e kau fakalaumālie, mou faito‘o ki ha taha pehē ‘o anga fakaalaala; pea ke vakai kiate koe na‘a ‘iloange ‘e ‘ahi‘ahi‘i mo koe foki.
Mou fetoutou fefua‘aki homou ngaahi mafasia‘anga: pea ‘i ho‘omou fai pehē, kuo mou ‘osiki ‘aupito ‘a e lao ‘a Kalaisi.
Seuke, kapau ‘oku ‘afungi ‘e ha taha ko ha me‘a ia; ‘osi, ‘oku ‘ikai ko ha momo‘i me‘a ia, ‘oku fakahala‘i ia ‘e hono loto.
Ka ke takitaha sivi ‘ene ngāue ‘a‘ana; pea te ne toki fakafuofua ‘aki ia pē hono pōlepole‘anga, ‘o ‘ikai ‘aki ha taha kehe:
koe‘uhi kuo pau ke takitaha fua ‘ene kavenga ‘a‘ana.
Pea ko eni, ko ia ‘oku akonekina ‘i he Folofola, ke ne tuku kiate ia ‘oku faiako ke ‘inasi ‘i he‘ene koloa kotoa.
‘Oua na‘a tuku ke fakahala‘i kimoutolu: tala‘ehai ‘oku ala pā‘usi‘i ‘a e ‘Otua; he ‘ilonga pē e me‘a ‘oku tō ‘e ha tangata, ko ia ia te ne utu foki.
He ko ia ‘oku ne tō ‘i hono kakano, te ne utu mei he kakano ‘a e ‘auha: ka ko ia ‘oku ne tō ‘i he laumālie, te ne utu mei he laumālie ‘a e mo‘ui ta‘engata.
Ka ‘oua na‘a ta fiu ‘i he failelei, he te ta utu ‘i hono fa‘ahita‘u, ‘o kapau ‘e ‘ikai te ta vaivai.
Pea kapau ko ia, pea lolotonga ‘oku ta faingamālie, ta ngāue ‘aonga ki he kakai kotoa pē: kae lahi pē kiate kinautolu ‘oku ‘i he fāmili ‘o e lotu.
Vakai ‘ete tohi mata lalahi ma‘amoutolu ‘aki hoku nima ‘o‘oku.

‘Ilonga ‘a kinautolu ‘oku tangi ke hā matamatalelei ‘i tu‘a sino, ko kinautolu ia ‘oku kouna kimoutolu ke mou kamu: ka ko hono ‘uhinga pē, ke ‘oua na‘a fakatanga‘i kinautolu, koe‘uhi ko e Kolosi ‘o Kalaisi.
He na‘a mo e fa‘ahinga kamu na, tala‘ehai ‘oku nau tauhi ‘a e Lao ‘e kinautolu: ka ‘oku nau tangi ke mou kamu, koe‘uhi ke nau tu‘unga ‘i homou kakano ha‘anau pōlepole.
Ka ko au, molekemama‘o ha‘aku pōlepole, ka ‘i he Kolosi ‘o hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi, ‘a ia kuo kalusefai ai ‘a māmani kiate au, mo au ki māmani.
He tala‘ehai ko ha me‘a ‘a e kamu, pe ko ha me‘a ‘a e ta‘ekamu, ka ko e fakatupufo‘ou pē.
Pea ‘ilonga kinautolu te nau fai ‘enau laka ki he fua ko eni, ‘ofa ke hifo kiate kinautolu ‘a e fiemālie mo e meesi, pea pehē foki ki he ha‘a ‘Isileli faka-‘Otua!
Hili ‘eni, ke ‘oua na‘a fakangangau‘i au ‘e ha taha: he ko au ‘oku te ‘alu mo kita ‘a e ngaahi faka‘ilonga ‘o Sīsū, kuo tā ‘i hoku sino.
Ko e kelesi ‘a hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi, ‘ofa, kāinga, ke ‘i homou laumālie ia! ‘Ēmeni.
TŪ KO AU PAULA, ko e ‘aposetolo ‘a Kalaisi Sīsū ‘i he tu‘utu‘uni ‘a e ‘Otua, ko ‘eku tohi ki he kāinga lotu ‘oku nofo ‘i ‘Efesō, ‘a ia ‘oku nau tui kia Kalaisi Sīsū.
‘Ofa ke mou ma‘u kelesi mo e fiemālie, mei he ‘Otua ko ‘etau Tamai mo e ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi.

Ha taha ā ke fakamālō‘ia pe ko e ‘Otua mo Tamai ‘a hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi, ‘a ia na‘a ne fai hotau tāpuekina ‘ia Kalaisi, ke tau anuanu ‘i he ngaahi tāpuaki kehekehe mei he Laumālie ‘i he ngaahi feitu‘u ‘o langi;
‘o fakatatau ki he‘ene fili na‘e fai ma‘ana ‘i he te‘eki ke tanupou ‘a māmani, ‘a e fili kitautolu ‘iate Ia, ke tau mā‘oni‘oni mo ta‘emele ‘i he‘ene ‘afio hifo, ‘o tu‘unga ‘i he ‘ofa,
‘o ne toka tu‘utu‘uni kitautolu ke ohi ‘ia Sīsū Kalaisi ki He‘ene ‘Afio, ‘o fakatatau ki he me‘a na‘e hā lelei ki hono finangalo,
ke fakamālō‘ia ‘a e lāngilangi‘ia ‘o ‘ene kelesi ‘a ia na‘a ne me‘a‘ofa ‘aki mai ‘i he Pele;
‘a ia, ‘i he‘etau ‘iate ia, ‘oku tau ma‘u ni ‘a e huhu‘i, ko e me‘a ‘i hono ta‘ata‘a, ko e fakamolemole ‘o ‘etau ngaahi angahala, ‘o fakatatau ki he mohu me‘a ‘o ‘ene kelesi.
‘A ia na‘a ne lilingi mai ke lahi ko e fa‘ahinga poto kehekehe mo e ‘ilo‘ilo,
he‘ene faka‘ilo kiate kitautolu ‘a e misiteli ‘o ‘ene tu‘utu‘uni, ‘o fakatatau ai pē ki he me‘a na‘e hā lelei kiate ia,
‘a ia na‘a ne tu‘utu‘uni ‘i hono finangalo ma‘a e ākenga ‘a e kuonga faka‘osi, ko e pehē ke fālute ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē ‘ia Kalaisi, ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku ‘i langi, mo e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku ‘i māmani;

‘io, ‘i He‘ene ‘Afio ‘a ia ne fai ‘iate ia foki homau fili mōno tofi‘a, ‘o toka tu‘utu‘uni kimautolu ki ai, ‘o fakatatau ki he finangalo ‘o ‘Ene ‘Afio, ‘a ia ‘oku ne ngāue‘i ‘a e ngaahi me‘a kotoa pē ‘i he ‘alunga ‘o e fakakaukau ‘o hono finangalo;
koe‘uhi ke nofo kimautolu mo‘o fakamālō‘ia ‘ene lāngilangi‘ia, ‘a kimautolu ne falala tōmu‘a kia Kalaisi.

‘A ia na‘a mou falala foki ki ai, ‘i ho‘omou fanongo ki he tala ‘o e mo‘oni, ko e Kōsipeli ‘o homou fakamo‘ui; pea ‘i ho‘omou tui foki na‘e fai ‘iate ia homou sila‘i ‘aki ‘a e Laumālie na‘e tala‘ofa, ‘a e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni:
‘a ia ko e me‘a faka‘amanaki ‘o hotau tofi‘a; koe‘uhi ke lava ‘a e huhu‘i ‘o ‘ene koloa na‘e fakatau, kae fakamālō‘ia ‘ene lāngilangi‘ia.
Ko ia, ko au foki, ‘i he‘eku fanongo ki ho‘omou tui ki he ‘Eiki ko Sīsū, mo ho‘omou ‘ofa ki he kāinga lotu kotoa pē.
Ko ia, ‘oku ‘ikai tuku ai ‘eku fakafeta‘i koe‘uhi ko kimoutolu, mo ‘eku takua kimoutolu ‘i he‘eku ngaahi lotu;

ke ‘ofa ‘a e ‘Otua ‘o hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi, ko e Tamai ‘oku ‘a‘ana ‘a e lāngilangi, ke ne ‘ofa ‘o tuku kiate kimoutolu ha laumālie fakapoto, mo faka‘ilo me‘a mei he Ta‘ehāmai, ke ngāue ‘i he ‘ilo‘i lelei ‘o ‘Ene ‘Afio;

kuo fakamaama kimoutolu, ‘a e mata ‘o homou loto, ke mou ‘ilo pe ko e hā ‘a e ‘amanaki ‘oku tupu mei he‘ene ui, pea ko e hā hono lahi faufau ‘o e lāngilangi‘ia ‘o hono tofi‘a, ‘a ia ‘oku ma‘u ‘e he kau mā‘oni‘oni,
pea mo hono lahi ‘i he lahi ange fau ‘o ‘ene māfimafi, ‘a ia ‘oku ngāue ma‘atautolu ‘oku tui; ‘a ia ‘oku hoa mo e ngāue tōtōivi ‘o ‘ene māfimafi,
‘a ia na‘a ne fai ‘ia Kalaisi, he‘ene fokotu‘u ia mei he pekia, mo ne fakanofo ia mei hono to‘omata‘u ‘i he ngaahi feitu‘u ‘o Langi,

‘o mā‘olunga ‘i he fa‘ahinga pule kotoa pē, mo e ma‘u tu‘unga, mo e ma‘u mālohi, mo e tu‘unga ‘eiki, ‘io, ‘i he hingoa kotoa pē ‘oku hingoa ‘aki ‘i he tu‘u ko eni, pea ‘ikai ngata ai, ka ‘i he tu‘u foki ka hoko mai;
pea na‘a ne tuku ke ‘i he lalo va‘e ‘o‘ona ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē; pea ne foaki ia ke ‘ulu ki he Siasi ‘i he me‘a kotoa pē;
‘a ia ko hono sino tofu pē ia, ko e nofo‘anga ‘o e kātokatoa ‘o ‘Ene ‘Afio, ‘a ia ‘oku ne fakafonu ‘a e ngaahi me‘a kotoa pē ‘aki ‘enau ngaahi me‘a.
PEA ko kimoutolu, na‘a mou mate ‘i ho‘omou ngaahi talangata‘a mo e angahala;

‘a ia na‘a mou fou ai ‘i mu‘a ‘i he ‘alunga ‘o e nofo faka-e-maama-ko eni, ‘i he ‘alunga ‘o e ‘eiki ‘o e pule‘anga ‘o e ‘atā, ko e ‘eiki ‘o e fa‘ahinga laumālie ‘oku lolotonga ngāue ni ‘i he hako ‘o talangata‘a;

‘a ia na‘a ta kau ai ‘a kitaua foki ‘i mu‘a, pea na‘a ta mo‘ui‘aki kotoa pē ‘a e fai ki he ngaahi holi ‘o hotau kakano, he‘eta feia ‘a e ngaahi tu‘utu‘uni ‘a hota kakano mo ‘eta ngaahi fakakaukau, pea na‘a ta nofo ai pē ko e fānau ‘o e houhau ‘i he ‘ulungāanga, ‘o hangē foki ko e kakai kotoa pē.
Ka ko e ‘Otua, ‘a ia ‘oku ne mohu ‘alo‘ofa, ko e me‘a ‘i he ‘ofa lahi ‘a ia na‘a ne ‘ofeina ‘aki ‘a kitautolu,
neongo kuo tau mate ‘i he ngaahi talangata‘a, na‘a ne kaungā fakamo‘ui hake kitautolu mo Kalaisi, (ko e kelesi pē kuo mou mo‘ui mei ai),
pea ne kaungā fokotu‘u kitautolu mo ia, mo ne kaungā fakanofo mo ia ‘i he ngaahi feitu‘u ‘o langi ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū:
koe‘uhi ke ne fakahā atu ‘i he ngaahi kuonga ka hoko mai hono lahi ‘i he lahi ange fau ‘o ‘ene kelesi ‘aki ‘ene anga‘ofa kiate kitautolu ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū.
He ko e kelesi pē kuo mou mo‘ui mei ai, ko e me‘a ‘i ho‘omou tui; ‘io, na‘e ‘ikai meiate kimoutolu ia, ka ko e foaki mei he ‘Otua:
na‘e ‘ikai tupu mei ha ngaahi ngāue, koe‘uhi ke ‘oua na‘a ai ha taha ‘e fa‘a pōlepole.
He ko ‘ene ngaohi ‘a kitautolu, kuo fakatupu ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū ke fai ‘a e ngaahi ngāue lelei, ‘a ia na‘e toka teuteu ‘e he ‘Otua ke tau fou ai.
Ko ia, mou manatu ki he taimi mu‘a, ‘a kimoutolu ‘oku Senitaile homou kakano, mou lau ko e Ta‘ekamu ‘e he fa‘ahinga ‘oku lau ko e Kamu (‘a e kamu ‘i he kakano pea fai ‘e he nima)–

‘io, manatu, ko e taimi ko ia na‘e ‘ikai hamou kaunga ‘ia Kalaisi, ka mou nofo ko e kau fakahee‘i mei he pule‘anga ‘o ‘Isileli, ko e muli ta‘ekau ‘i he ngaahi fuakava ki he Tala‘ofa, ko e kau ta‘e-ha-‘amanaki-lelei, mo e kau taka he ‘univeesi ta‘ema‘u ‘a e ‘Otua.
Ka ‘i onopooni, ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū, ko kimoutolu na‘e mama‘o mu‘a, ne fakaofi ‘aki ‘a e ta‘ata‘a ‘o Kalaisi.
He ko hotau melino‘anga ia, ‘a ia na‘a ne ngaohi ‘a e ua ke taha; ‘io, na‘a ne holoki ‘aki hono kakano ‘a e ‘āvahevahe,
‘a ia ko e fe‘ite‘itani, mo ne fakaka‘anga ‘a e lao fekau ‘a ia ko e koto tu‘utu‘uni pē, koe‘uhi ke ne ngaohi ‘a e ua ko ia ko ha tangata fo‘ou pē taha ‘iate ia, pea fakalelei ai;
pea ‘i he‘eta sino taha ke ne toe fakalelei mo e ‘Otua ‘a kitaua ‘osi pē, ko e me‘a ‘i he Kolosi, he‘ene tāmate‘i ‘a e fe‘ite‘itani ‘i he me‘a ko ia.
Pea ne ha‘u ‘o tala melino kiate kimoutolu na‘e mama‘o, mo tala melino ki he kakai na‘e ofi:
he vakai, ko e me‘a ‘iate ia ‘oku ta fakatou apaapangofua ke hoko atu ki he Tamai, he‘eta Laumālie taha.
Pea ko ia, ‘oku ‘ikai te mou kei ko e kau muli mo e ‘āunofo, ka ‘oku mou kolo taha mo e fa‘ahinga tapu, pea ‘oku mou ‘i he Fāmili ‘o e ‘Otua.
He kuo langa kimoutolu ki he makatu‘unga ko e kau ‘aposetolo mo e kau palōfita, ko Sīsū Kalaisi ia ko hono maka taufatungamotu‘a;
‘a ia ‘oku fai ai pē ‘i He‘ene ‘Afio ‘a e hokohoko lelei ‘o e fale kotoa, pea ‘oku faka‘a‘au hake ai pē ia ke hoko ko ha temipale tapu, tu‘u ‘i he ‘Eiki;
‘a ‘Ene ‘Afio ‘oku fakahoko ai ‘a kimoutolu foki ki he fale, mo‘o ‘afio‘anga ‘o e ‘Otua ‘i he Laumālie.
PEA koe‘uhi ko e me‘a ko ia, ko au Paula, ko e nofo pilīsone ‘a Kalaisi Sīsū koe‘uhi ko kimoutolu Senitaile–
[He ‘oku te pehē na‘a mou fanongo ki he‘eku ma‘u lakanga, ko e sētuata ‘o e kelesi ‘a e ‘Otua, ‘a ia na‘e tuku kiate au ma‘amoutolu:
‘io, ‘a e faka‘ilo kiate au mei he Ta‘ehāmai ‘a e misiteli, ‘o hangē ko ia na‘a ku ki‘i lea ki ai ‘anenai;
pea ‘i ho‘omou lau ia te mou ‘ilo mei ai ‘a e lahi ‘o ‘eku poto ‘i he misiteli faka-Kalaisi.
‘A ia na‘e ‘ikai faka‘ilo ‘i he ngaahi kuonga kehe ki he hako ‘o e tangata, ‘o hangē ko hono fakahā ‘i onopooni ‘e he Laumālie ki he kau ‘Aposetolo tapu ‘a ‘Ene ‘Afio, mo ‘ene kau palōfita;
‘a ia ko e pehē, ‘Oku kaungā ‘ea mo kimautolu ‘a e Senitaile, mo kaungā sino, mo kaungā kau ‘i he Tala‘ofa, ‘o tu‘unga ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū, pea founga ‘i he Kōsipeli:
‘a e Kōsipeli ko ia ‘a ia na‘a ku hoko ko hono faifekau, pea ko e mātu‘aki foaki pē mo ia, ko e kelesi mei he ‘Otua, ‘a ia na‘e tuku mai ‘i he ngāue ‘a ‘ene Māfimafi.
‘Io, ko au ia ne tuku ki ai ‘a e kelesi ni, ‘a au ko e si‘i ‘i he si‘i ange fau ‘i he kau lotu kotoa pē, ke ‘a‘aku ‘a e malanga‘aki ki he Senitaile ‘a e koloa ‘a Kalaisi ‘oku ta‘efa‘a hakulea:
kae‘uma‘ā ke te tūhulu kinautolu ki he ‘alunga ‘o e misiteli ko ia, ‘a ia ne fufū mei mu‘a ‘i mu‘a ‘i he finangalo ‘o e ‘Otua, (‘a ‘ene ‘Afio ne ne ngaohi ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē);
koe‘uhi ke e‘a ai ‘i onopooni mei he siasi ki he fa‘ahinga pule mo ma‘u tu‘unga ‘i he ngaahi feitu‘u ‘o langi, ‘a e poto faifio ‘a e ‘Otua.
‘A ia ko e tu‘utu‘uni talu mei mu‘a, pea fai ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū ko hotau ‘Eiki;
‘a ia ‘oku tu‘unga ai ‘etau ta‘emālū‘ia ni, mo ‘ene apaapangofua ke tau hoko atu, he‘etau fai falala, ko e tupu ‘i he‘etau tui ki He‘ene ‘Afio.
Ko ia ‘oku ou kole atu, ke ‘oua te mou fo‘i ‘i he ngaahi mamahi kuo hoko kiate au, koe‘uhi ko ‘eku taukave kimoutolu: he ko e me‘a pehē ‘oku hā ai homau mahu‘inga.]
‘Io, koe‘uhiā ko e me‘a ko ia, ko ia ‘oku ou peluki hoku tui ki he Tamai,
‘a ia ‘oku tauhingoa ki ai ‘a e ngaahi fāmili kotoa pē ‘i langi mo māmani,
ko ‘eku kole ke foaki kiate kimautolu, ‘o taau mo e mohu me‘a ‘o ‘Ene ‘Afio, ke ne tuku ke fou mai ha ivi ‘i hono Laumālie ki homou tangata-‘i-loto ke mou mālohi ai;
kae fale ‘a Kalaisi ‘i homou loto, ko e me‘a ‘i ho‘omou tui;

pea ‘i ho‘omou aka leva ‘i he ‘ofa, mo pulusi ki he tu‘unga ko ia, ke mou faifai pea mou lava ‘aupito ke lave‘i, hangē ko e kau mā‘oni‘oni kotoa pē, hono māukupu, mo hono lōloa, mo hono mā‘olunga, mo hono loloto–
‘io, ke ‘ilo ‘a e ‘ofa ‘a Kalaisi, ‘a ia ‘oku hulu atu ‘i he ngata‘anga ‘o e ‘ilo; kae fakafonu kimoutolu ke a‘usia hono kātokatoa kotoa ‘o e ‘Otua.
Pea ko ‘Ene ‘Afio, ‘a ia ‘oku ne lava ke fai ma‘atautolu ‘o hulu atu noa pē ‘i he ngaahi me‘a ‘oku tau fa‘a kolea pe fakakaukau ki ai, koe‘uhi ko e ivi ‘oku ngāue ‘i hotau loto,
‘io, ke ‘o ‘Ene ‘Afio ‘a e kolōlia ‘i he Siasi, pea ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū, kae ‘osi ‘a e ngaahi to‘utangata ‘o e ngaahi kuonga ‘o ‘ītāniti! ‘Ēmeni.
KO IA ‘oku ou tokoni atu, ‘a kita ‘oku te nofo pilīsone ko ‘ete ‘i he ‘Eiki, ke mou laka ‘o taau mo e lakanga na‘e ui kimoutolu ki ai,
pea ō mo e fa‘a faka‘aki‘akimui mo e anga malū, pea ō mo e anga mokomoko ‘o mou fekātaki‘aki pē ‘i he ‘ofa,
mo feinga ke tauhi ‘aki ‘a e no‘o ko e melino, ‘a e taha kuo fakatupu ‘e he Laumālie.
‘Oku taha pē ‘a e Sino, pea taha ‘a e Laumālie, hangē foki ‘oku taha ‘a e ‘amanaki ‘oku tupu mei he ui na‘e ui‘aki kimoutolu.
‘Oku taha pē ‘a e ‘Eiki, taha ‘a e Tui, taha ‘a e Papitaiso;
taha ‘a e ‘Otua mo Tamai ‘a e kakai kotoa pē, ‘a ia ‘oku pule ki he kakai kotoa pē, pea ‘oku fou atu ‘i he kakai kotoa pē pea ‘oku nofo‘ia ‘a e kakai kotoa pē.
Ka na‘e foaki kelesi kiate kitautolu tāutaha, ‘o fakafuofua ki he lahi ‘o e me‘a‘ofa ‘a Kalaisi.
Ko ia ‘oku ne folofola ai, “Ne ne hā‘ele ki ‘olunga Ne ne taki pōpula ha koto pōpula, Pea ne foaki me‘a‘ofa ki he tangata."
Pea ko e lau ki he‘ene hā‘ele ki ‘olunga, ko e hā hano ‘uhinga ka ko eni pē, tā na‘a ne hā‘ele hifo foki ki Lolofonua.
Ko ia na‘a ne hā‘ele hifo, ko ia pē foki na‘a ne hā‘ele hake, ‘o ‘osi hifo ‘a e ngaahi langi; koe‘uhiā ke ne aoniu ‘i he me‘a kotoa pē.
Pea foaki pē ‘e ia ha ni‘ihi ‘oku ‘aposetolo, ha ni‘ihi ‘oku palōfita, ha ni‘ihi ‘oku ‘evangeliō, ha ni‘ihi ‘oku tauhi mo faiako:
koe‘uhi ke ‘osi sāuni ‘a e kakai lotu ma‘a e ngāue tokoni, mo‘o langa hake ‘a e sino ‘o Kalaisi:
kae‘oua ke tau a‘usia kotoa pē ‘a e tui taha mo e ‘ilo taha ki he ‘Alo ‘o e ‘Otua, ke a‘usia ‘a e tangata haohaoa, ke a‘usia ‘a e fua, ko e lahi ‘o e kakato ‘a Kalaisi.
Koe‘uhi ke ‘oua na‘a tau kei tamaiki, ‘o felīlī‘aki mo fe‘ave‘aki fano ‘e he matangi fakaakonaki kotoa pē ‘oku tupu ‘i he fiemu‘a ‘a e kakai, ‘i he kākā ‘oku ngāue ke maau ‘a e me‘a fakahē:
ka tau fai‘aki ‘a e totonu ‘i he ‘ofa, ‘o tau tupu hake ‘i he‘etau me‘a kotoa pē ke hokosi ‘a e toko taha ko ia, ‘a ia ko e ‘Ulu, ‘a Kalaisi:

‘a ia ‘oku hokohoko lelei mei ai, mo fema‘uma‘utaki mei ai, ‘a e sino kotoa, pea fai ai pē ‘ene tupu mei he ngaahi fakahoko‘anga kotoa pē ‘o e tokoni, ‘i he ngāue ‘a e fo‘i me‘a takitaha ‘o taau mo ‘ene mafai, mo‘o langa hake ‘o e sino ‘i he ‘ofa.
Ko ia, ko e me‘a ‘oku ou tala mo fakapapau atu ‘i he ‘Eiki, ‘a ‘eni, ke ‘oua te mou kei laka ‘o hangē ko e fai ‘a Senitaile; ‘a ia ‘oku nau fou ‘i he muna ‘a honau loto,
kuo fakapo‘uli honau ‘atamai, kuo nau motu mei he mo‘ui ‘a e ‘Otua, ko e me‘a ‘i he vale ‘oku nofo‘ia kinautolu, ko e me‘a ‘i he fakafefeka honau loto:
‘a ia ko e fa‘ahinga ‘oku ongonoa, pea nau li‘oa kinautolu ki he pau‘u, ke fai ‘a e anga‘uli kotoa pē ‘i he havala.
Ka tala‘ehai na‘e pehē ho‘omou ako Kalaisi:
he ‘oku te pehē ko ia ia na‘a mou fanongo ki ai, pea ‘i ho‘omou ‘iate ia na‘a mou ako ‘i he ‘alunga ‘o e mo‘oni ‘oku hā ‘ia Sīsū–
‘o pehē, ke mou liliu ho‘omou tō‘onga mu‘a, ‘o hu‘ihu‘i ‘a e motu‘a tangata, ‘a ia ‘oku ‘au‘auha ko e me‘a ‘i he ngaahi holi ‘a kākā:
pea ke mou tuku ke fai ai pē homou fakafo‘ou ‘e he Laumālie ‘o homou ‘atamai;
pea ke mou kofu ‘aki ‘a e tangata fo‘ou, ‘a ia na‘e ngaohi ke hoko ki he ‘Otua ‘i he angatonu mo e mā‘oni‘oni ‘a Mo‘oni.
Pea ko eni, kuo tuku ‘a e loi, ko ia mou takitaha lea mo‘oni ‘i he feangai mo hono kaungā‘api; he ko e ngaahi kupu kitautolu ‘oku fekau‘aki.
‘Ita pē, kae‘oua ‘e angahala ai: ‘oua ‘e tuku ke tō ‘a e la‘ā ‘oku mou kei mamahi;
kae‘uma‘ā, ‘oua na‘a tuku ha ava ki he Tēvolo.
Ke ‘oua na‘a kei kaiha‘a ‘e he kaiha‘a: ka ne fakafitefita‘a mu‘a, ‘o ngāue‘aki ‘a e ongo nima ko ia ki he me‘a ‘oku lelei, koe‘uhi ke ai ha‘ane me‘a ke foaki ki he masiva.

‘Ilonga ha lea ‘e ‘ikai sia‘a, pea tapu ‘ene hū atu mei homou ngutu: ka ‘oka ai ha me‘a ‘oku ngali ‘aonga ‘i he faingata‘a ‘oku fai, ke ‘alu atu ia, hei‘ilo ‘e ma‘u tokoni mei ai ‘e he kakai ‘oku fanongo.
Pea ‘oua ‘e ‘ai ke mamahi ‘a e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni ko ia ‘o e ‘Otua, ‘a ia na‘e sila ‘aki kimoutolu ki he ‘aho huhu‘i.
Ko e fakamahū kotoa pē mo e lili mo e ‘ita mo e fe‘ioho‘aki mo e lau‘ikovi, tuku ke hiki ia meiate kimoutolu, ‘io, mo e lotokovi kotoa.

Ka mou anga‘ofa mu‘a ‘i ho‘omou feangai, mo manava‘ofa, pea mou fefakamolemole‘aki, ‘o hangē foki ko e ‘Otua ne ne fakamolemole kimoutolu ‘ia Kalaisi. Ko ia, mou hoko mu‘a ko e kau fa‘ifa‘itaki ki he ‘Otua, ‘o taau mo e fānau kuo ‘ofeina:
pea fou ‘i he ‘ofa, ‘o hangē foki ko Kalaisi ne ne ‘ofa‘i kimoutolu, ‘o ne li‘oa ia koe‘uhi ko kimoutolu, ko e hifo mo e feilaulau ki he ‘Otua mo‘o ngangatu fakahōifua.
Ka ko e me‘a ki he fe‘auaki mo e anga ‘uli kotoa pē, ‘uma‘ā ‘a e mānumanu,
na‘a mo e lau ki ai ke mou faka‘ehi‘ehi mei ai, telia ‘a e taau ‘o e feangai ‘a e kakai lotu;
